# ::id nw.chtb_0012.2 ::date 2012-11-01T12:24:32 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt According to Taiwan 's " Ministry of Economy " statistics , the volume of trade between mainland and Taiwan last year was 20.9 billion US dollars .
# ::save-date Thu Dec 19, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0012_2.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (s2 / statistic
            :source (g / government-organization :wiki "Ministry_of_Economic_Affairs_(Taiwan)"
                  :name (n / name :op1 "Ministry" :op2 "of" :op3 "Economy")
                  :poss c))
      :ARG1 (m2 / monetary-quantity :quant 20900000000
            :unit (d / dollar
                  :mod (c2 / country :wiki "United_States"
                        :name (n3 / name :op1 "US")))
            :domain (v / volume
                  :quant-of (t / trade-01
                        :ARG0 (m / mainland)
                        :ARG2 (c / country :wiki "Taiwan"
                              :name (n2 / name :op1 "Taiwan")))
                  :time (y / year
                        :mod (l / last)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0012.3 ::date 2012-11-01T13:14:28 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Of this volume , the value of Taiwan 's exports to the mainland was 17.8 billion US dollars , having increased by 20 percent compared with last year ; the import value was 3.1 billion US dollars , having increased by 74 percent compared with last year .
# ::save-date Sun Dec 1, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0012_3.txt

      :op1 (v / value-01
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :ARG1-of (e / export-01

                  :unit (d / dollar
                        :mod (c4 / country :wiki "United_States"
                              :name (n2 / name :op1 "US"))))
            :ARG1-of (i / increase-01
                  :ARG2 (p / percentage-entity :value 20)
                  :ARG4 m2
                  :ARG1-of (c2 / compare-01
                        :ARG2 (y / year
                              :mod (l / last)))))
      :op2 (v3 / value-01
            :ARG1 (t4 / thing
                  :ARG1-of (i3 / import-01))
            :ARG2 (m3 / monetary-quantity :quant 3100000000
                  :unit (d3 / dollar
                        :mod c4))
            :ARG1-of (i2 / increase-01
                  :ARG2 (p2 / percentage-entity :value 74)
                  :ARG4 m3
                  :ARG1-of (c3 / compare-01
                        :ARG2 y)))
      :part-of (v2 / volume
            :mod (t3 / this)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0027.8 ::date 2012-11-07T17:31:13 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt It is thought that the purpose of this visit is to improve and develop the relationship between the two countries , to strengthen bilateral economic and trade co-operation and to expand Thailand 's investment in Myanmar .
# ::save-date Sun Dec 8, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0027_8.txt
(t / think-01
      :ARG1 (h / have-purpose-91
            :ARG1 (v / visit-01
                  :mod (t3 / this))
            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (i2 / improve-01
                        :ARG1 (r / relationship
                              :mod (b2 / between
                                    :op1 (c / country :wiki "Thailand"
                                          :name (n / name :op1 "Thailand"))
                                    :op2 (c2 / country :wiki "Burma"
                                          :name (n2 / name :op1 "Myanmar")))))
                  :op2 (d / develop-02
                        :ARG1 r)
                  :op3 (s / strengthen-01
                        :ARG1 (c3 / cooperate-01
                              :ARG0 c
                              :ARG1 c2
                              :mod (b / bilateral)
                              :mod (e / economy)
                              :mod (t2 / trade-01)))
                  :op4 (e2 / expand-01
                        :ARG1 (i3 / invest-01
                              :ARG0 c
                              :ARG2 c2)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0027.9 ::date 2012-11-07T17:34:19 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Yesterday and today , the Myanmaran government reopened three main trading ports located in the border area of Myanmar and Thailand that were closed last year .
# ::save-date Sun Dec 8, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0027_9.txt
(r / reopen-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c4 / country :wiki "Burma"
                        :name (n / name :op1 "Myanmar"))))
      :ARG1 (p / port :quant 3
            :mod (t / trade-01)
            :mod (m / main)
            :location (a / area
                  :location-of (b / border-01
                        :ARG1 c4
                        :ARG2 (c2 / country :wiki "Thailand"
                              :name (n2 / name :op1 "Thailand"))))
            :ARG1-of (c3 / close-01
                  :time (y / year
                        :mod (l / last))))
      :time (a2 / and
            :op1 (y2 / yesterday)
            :op2 (t2 / today)))

                  :name (n4 / name :op1 "Medical" :op2 "Appliance" :op3 "Industry" :op4 "Company")

                        :name (n5 / name :op1 "China"))))
      :time (r / recent))

      :time (p / present))

# ::id nw.chtb_0028.5 ::date 2012-11-08T12:24:38 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon Jan 13, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0028_5.txt

            :mod (n / new)

                  :ARG2 (n3 / name :op1 "Chengdu" :op2 "General" :op3 "Medical" :op4 "Equipment" :op5 "Southwest" :op6 "Co." :op7 "Ltd.")))

            :op1 (d / develop-02
                  :ARG0 e2
                  :ARG1 (e3 / equipment
                        :ARG0-of (x2 / x-ray-01)
                        :purpose (d2 / diagnose-01
                              :mod (m2 / medical))))
            :op2 (p / produce-01
                  :ARG0 e2
                  :ARG1 e3)
            :op3 (m3 / manufacture-01
                  :ARG0 e2
                  :ARG1 e3)
            :op4 (a2 / assemble-01
                  :ARG0 e2
                  :ARG1 e3)
            :op5 (m4 / market-01
                  :ARG0 e2
                  :ARG1 e3)
            :op6 (t2 / trade-01
                  :ARG0 e2
                  :mod (i / import-01)
                  :mod (e4 / export-01))
            :op7 (c2 / consult-01
                  :ARG0 e2)
            :op8 (c3 / cooperate-01
                  :ARG0 e2
                  :mod (t3 / technology))
            :op9 (e5 / et-cetera))
      :mod (m / main))

# ::id nw.chtb_0028.6 ::date 2012-11-08T12:41:56 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

            :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))
      :mod (a / also)
      :manner (l / lease-02
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (a3 / airplane)
                  :op2 (c3 / container)))
      :ARG2-of (e2 / except-01
            :ARG1 (s / set-03
                  :ARG0 c

                        :mod (v / venture
                              :mod (j / joint))))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0028.8 ::date 2012-11-08T13:04:09 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Sun Dec 8, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0028_8.txt

      :op2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (p / purchase-01
                  :ARG0 (c / company :wiki "General_Electric"
                        :name (n / name :op1 "GE"))
                  :ARG1 (p2 / product)
                  :ARG3 (m2 / more-than
                        :op1 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 40000000
                              :unit (d / dollar
                                    :mod (c3 / country :wiki "United_States"
                                          :name (n4 / name :op1 "US")))))
                  :location (c2 / country :wiki "China"
                        :name (n2 / name :op1 "China")))
            :op2 (p3 / plan-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (i / increase-01
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 (v / volume
                              :quant-of (p4 / purchase-01
                                    :ARG1 (p5 / product
                                          :mod c2)))
                        :time (a3 / after
                              :op1 (n5 / now)
                              :quant (t / temporal-quantity :quant 2
                                    :unit (y / year))))))
      :time (d3 / date-entity :year 1994))

                        :op3 (e3 / et-cetera))

# ::id nw.chtb_0039.2 ::date 2012-11-15T12:24:31 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Chinese branch of the American Chamber of Commerce recently dispatched a delegation made up of twenty - five people launching a month - long lobbying campaign in Washington directed at congress and the White House , asking them to continue to extend granting China most - favored - nation trading status .
# ::save-date Tue Apr 15, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0039_2.txt
(d / dispatch-01
      :ARG0 (b / branch
            :mod (c / country :wiki "China"
                  :name (n / name :op1 "China"))
            :part-of (g / government-organization :wiki "United_States_Chamber_of_Commerce"
                  :name (n2 / name :op1 "Chamber" :op2 "of" :op3 "Commerce")
                  :mod (c2 / country :wiki "United_States"
                        :name (n3 / name :op1 "America"))))
      :ARG1 (d2 / delegation
            :ARG0-of (l / launch-01
                  :ARG1 (c3 / campaign-01
                        :manner (l2 / lobby-01)
                        :duration (t / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                              :unit (m / month))
                        :location (c4 / city :wiki "Washington,_D.C."
                              :name (n4 / name :op1 "Washington"))
                        :ARG1-of (d3 / direct-01
                              :ARG2 (a / and
                                    :op1 (g2 / government-organization :wiki "United_States_Congress"
                                          :name (n5 / name :op1 "Congress"))
                                    :op2 (g3 / government-organization :wiki "White_House"
                                          :name (n6 / name :op1 "White" :op2 "House"))))
                        :ARG0-of (a2 / ask-01
                              :ARG1 (c5 / continue-01
                                    :ARG0 a
                                    :ARG1 (e / extend-01
                                          :ARG0 a
                                          :ARG1 (g4 / grant-01
                                                :ARG0 a
                                                :ARG1 (s / status
                                                      :mod (n7 / nation
                                                            :ARG1-of (f / favor-01
                                                                  :degree (m2 / most)))
                                                      :mod (t2 / trade-01))
                                                :ARG2 c)))
                              :ARG2 a)))
            :ARG1-of (m3 / make-07
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person :quant 25)))
      :time (r / recent))

# ::id nw.chtb_0039.3 ::date 2012-11-15T12:59:05 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Chamber of Commerce delegates participating in this lobbying campaign come from many well - known in Washington , large American companies , such as Dow Jones , AT&T , IBM , Boeing , McDonald Douglas , General Electric , Westinghouse , Ford , and the Xian Ni Lei De Group , etc .

                        :mod (t / this))))

                  :name (n2 / name :op1 "America"))

                        :name (n12 / name :op1 "IBM"))

                        :name (n7 / name :op1 "McDonald" :op2 "Douglas"))

                        :name (n8 / name :op1 "General" :op2 "Electric"))

                        :name (n9 / name :op1 "Westinghouse"))

                        :name (n10 / name :op1 "Ford"))

                        :name (n11 / name :op1 "Xian" :op2 "Ni" :op3 "Lei" :op4 "De" :op5 "Group"))
                  :op10 (e / et-cetera))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0039.4 ::date 2012-11-15T13:11:59 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt They split into five groups and altogether visited about 150 members of congress , congressional aides , and government officials , using their experience of investing in and managing enterprises in China to explain the necessity of extending giving China most - favored - nation trading status .
# ::save-date Sun Dec 8, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0039_4.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (s / split-01
            :ARG1 (t / they)
            :ARG2 (g / group :quant 5))
      :op2 (v / visit-01
            :ARG0 t
            :ARG1 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (g4 / government-organization :wiki "United_States_Congress"
                                    :name (n4 / name :op1 "Congress"))
                              :ARG2 (m / member)))
                  :op2 (p3 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 g4
                              :ARG2 (a4 / aide)))
                  :op3 (p4 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (g2 / government-organization
                                    :ARG0-of (g5 / govern-01))
                              :ARG2 (o / official)))
                  :quant (a2 / about :op1 150))
            :mod (a6 / altogether))
      :op3 (u / use-01
            :ARG0 t
            :ARG1 (e / experience-01
                  :ARG0 t
                  :ARG1 (a5 / and
                        :op1 (i2 / invest-01
                              :ARG0 t
                              :ARG2 (e2 / enterprise
                                    :location (c2 / country :wiki "China"
                                          :name (n / name :op1 "China"))))
                        :op2 (m2 / manage-01
                              :ARG0 t
                              :ARG1 e2)))
            :ARG2 (e3 / explain-01
                  :ARG0 t
                  :ARG1 (n2 / need-01
                        :ARG1 (e4 / extend-01
                              :ARG1 (g3 / give-01
                                    :ARG1 (s2 / status
                                          :mod (n3 / nation
                                                :ARG1-of (f / favor-01
                                                      :degree (m3 / most)))
                                          :mod (t2 / trade-01))
                                    :ARG2 c2))))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0039.5 ::date 2012-11-15T14:56:17 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt With the once - a - year deliberations by the American administration and congress concerning the question of China 's most - favored - nation trading status again approaching , American businesses in Washington are universally concerned that the disputes among America 's political parties in this big election year could make this question even more complicated , hence the organization of groups to carry out a lobbying campaign directed at them that is organized and is planned .
# ::save-date Tue Apr 15, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0039_5.txt
(c / cause-01
      :ARG0 (c2 / concern-01
            :ARG0 (p / possible
                  :domain (c5 / complicate-01
                        :ARG0 (d / dispute-01

                                    :mod (p3 / politics)
                                    :poss c3)
                              :time (y2 / year
                                    :mod (e / elect-01
                                          :mod (b2 / big))
                                    :mod (t / this)))
                        :ARG1 q
                        :degree (m2 / more
                              :mod (e2 / even))))
            :ARG1 (b / business
                  :mod (c3 / country :wiki "United_States" :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))
                  :location (c4 / city :wiki "Washington,_D.C." :name (n2 / name :op1 "Washington")))
            :mod (u / universal))
      :ARG1 (o / organize-01
            :ARG1 (g / group)
            :purpose (c6 / carry-03
                  :ARG0 g
                  :ARG1 (c7 / campaign-01
                        :manner (l / lobby-01)
                        :ARG1-of (d3 / direct-01
                              :ARG2 p2)
                        :ARG1-of (o2 / organize-01)
                        :ARG1-of (p4 / plan-01))))
      :time (a / approach-01
            :ARG1 (d4 / deliberate-01
                  :ARG0 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (g2 / government-organization
                              :mod c3
                              :ARG0-of (a3 / administrate-01
                                    :ARG1 c3))
                        :op2 (g3 / government-organization :wiki "United_States_Congress" :name (n5 / name :op1 "Congress")))
                  :ARG1 (q / question
                        :topic (s / status
                              :poss (c9 / country :wiki "China" :name (n3 / name :op1 "China"))

                              :unit (y / year))))
            :mod (a4 / again)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0039.6 ::date 2012-11-15T14:56:33 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Zhen Wang , a businessman of Chinese descent who is representing the Guangzhou chapter of the American Chamber of Commerce and the Xian Ni Lei De Group and is participating in the lobbying team , said to this reporter that , as a follow - up action to this lobbying effort , he prepared to mobilize tens of thousands of distributors who belong to the company to write to their local congressional representatives to support extending China 's most - favored - nation trading status .

            :name (n / name :op1 "Zhen" :op2 "Wang")

                        :op1 (c / chapter
                              :part-of (o4 / organization :wiki "United_States_Chamber_of_Commerce"
                                    :name (n4 / name :op1 "American" :op2 "Chamber" :op3 "of" :op4 "Commerce"))
                              :location (c2 / city :wiki "Guangzhou"
                                    :name (n8 / name :op1 "Guangzhou")))
                        :op2 (c3 / company :wiki -
                              :name (n5 / name :op1 "Xian" :op2 "Ni" :op3 "Lei" :op4 "De" :op5 "Group"))))
            :ARG0-of (p2 / participate-01
                  :ARG1 (t / team
                        :ARG0-of (l / lobby-01)))
            :ARG0-of (d2 / descend-01
                  :ARG1 (c4 / country :wiki "China"
                        :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))))
      :ARG1 (p4 / prepare-02
            :ARG0 b
            :ARG2 (m / mobilize-01
                  :ARG0 b
                  :ARG1 (p5 / person
                        :ARG0-of (d / distribute-01)
                        :quant (m3 / multiple :op1 10000)
                        :ARG0-of (b2 / belong-01
                              :ARG1 (c5 / company)))
                  :purpose (w / write-01
                        :ARG0 p5

                              :ARG0 p6

                                          :poss c4

                                          :name (n7 / name :op1 "Congress")))
                              :mod (l2 / local))))
            :prep-as (a / action
                  :ARG0-of (f2 / follow-03
                        :ARG1 (e2 / effort
                              :mod l
                              :mod (t4 / this)))))
      :ARG2 (p3 / person

            :mod (t2 / this)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0044.4 ::date 2012-11-15T14:58:34 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :mod (e / economy)

                  :ARG1 s)

                  :op2 (r3 / return-02
                        :ARG1 c2

                              :name (n5 / name :op1 "China"))))))

                  :ARG0 e2)

                  :ARG0 e2

                  :location (o / overseas)))

            :ARG0 c

                        :mod (f2 / foreign)

# ::id nw.chtb_0048.3 ::date 2012-11-15T16:17:40 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri Jan 10, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0048_3.txt

      :op1 (e / exceed-01 :ARG1 300
            :ARG0 (n / number
                  :quant-of (e2 / enterprise
                        :mod (t / type
                              :mod (v / various))
                        :location (c / city :wiki "Tianjin"
                              :name (n2 / name :op1 "Tianjin"))
                        :ARG0-of (i / invest-01
                              :location (o / overseas)))))
      :op2 (e3 / exceed-01
            :ARG0 (m2 / monetary-quantity
                  :ARG2-of (v2 / value-01
                        :ARG1 (i2 / invest-01))
                  :ARG2-of (t2 / total-01))
            :ARG1 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 100000000
                  :unit (d / dollar
                        :mod (c2 / country :wiki "United_States"
                              :name (n3 / name :op1 "US")))))
      :time (p / present))

# ::id nw.chtb_0048.4 ::date 2012-11-15T16:45:41 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt According to reports from the Committee of Foreign Economy and Trade of Tianjin , these more than 300 overseas enterprises are involved in industries such as import and export trade , production and processing , medical treatment and health , tourism , catering , engineering contracts , etc. , and are spread over more than sixty countries and regions .
# ::save-date Wed Dec 18, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0048_4.txt

      :ARG0 (r / report-01

                        :name (n2 / name :op1 "Tianjin"))))
      :ARG1 (a2 / and
            :op1 (i / involve-01
                  :ARG1 (e / enterprise
                        :mod (o3 / overseas)
                        :quant (m / more-than :op1 300)
                        :mod (t / this))
                  :ARG2 (i2 / industry
                        :example (a / and
                              :op1 (t2 / trade-01
                                    :mod (i3 / import-01)
                                    :mod (e2 / export-01))
                              :op2 (p / produce-01)
                              :op3 (p2 / process-01)
                              :op4 (t3 / treat-03
                                    :ARG3 (m2 / medicine))
                              :op5 (h / health)
                              :op6 (t4 / tourism)
                              :op7 (c3 / cater-01)
                              :op8 (c / contract
                                    :mod (e3 / engineer-01))
                              :op9 (e4 / et-cetera))))
            :op2 (s2 / spread-01
                  :ARG1 e
                  :ARG2 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (c5 / country)
                        :op2 (r2 / region)
                        :quant (m3 / more-than :op1 60)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0048.6 ::date 2012-11-15T16:58:37 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

            :name (n / name :op1 "Medicinal" :op2 "Diet")
            :ARG1-of (e / establish-01
                  :ARG0 (c / city :wiki "Tianjin"
                        :name (n2 / name :op1 "Tianjin"))
                  :location (c2 / country :wiki "Singapore"
                        :name (n3 / name :op1 "Singapore"))))
      :ARG1 (a2 / attention
            :poss (f / figure
                  :mod (l / local)
                  :mod (p / politics))))

            :mod (c3 / chain)

                  :mod (p2 / permit-01
                        :mod (s5 / special))))

            :example (a / and

                                          :ARG0 e)
                                    :op2 (b / build-01

            :time (y / year
                  :mod (n / next))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0052.1 ::date 2012-11-20T09:36:24 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :ARG1 (c2 / country :wiki "China"

                        :ARG1 (c3 / country :wiki "Japan"

            :manner (f / formal :polarity -))

            :name (n6 / name :op1 "Kuala" :op2 "Lumpur")

                        :mod (r2 / relation
                              :mod (f / foreign)))
                  :poss o)
            :manner (c2 / comprehensive))

                        :name (n3 / name :op1 "Southeast" :op2 "Asia")))

            :ARG1-of (b2 / base-02

                        :op1 (c4 / cooperate-01
                              :mod (e / economy))
                        :op2 (i3 / integrate-01
                              :ARG1 (a5 / and
                                    :op1 (p / politics)
                                    :op2 (e2 / economy)
                                    :op3 (s5 / security))))))
      :time (a7 / after
            :op1 (e3 / end
                  :op1 (w2 / war :wiki "Cold_War"

# ::id nw.chtb_0052.8 ::date 2012-11-20T13:01:39 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                              :mod (e2 / economy))
                        :mod (n / new)
                        :mod (i / international))))

            :mod (m / main)
            :time (a4 / and
                  :op1 (d2 / demand-01
                        :ARG0 (p2 / person
                              :poss (c3 / country
                                    :quant (a3 / all)))
                        :ARG1 (p4 / peace))

                  :op3 (s / seek-01
                        :ARG0 p2
                        :ARG1 (s2 / stability))
                  :op4 (p3 / promote-02
                        :ARG0 p2
                        :ARG1 (c5 / cooperate-01)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0052.14 ::date 2012-11-21T12:31:53 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :ARG2 (p / principle :quant 5

                                          :op1 (r2 / respect-01
                                                :ARG1 (a2 / and
                                                      :op1 (s / sovereignty)

                                                            :mod (t / territory)))
                                                :mod (m / mutual))
                                          :op2 (a3 / aggression :polarity -)

                                                :ARG1 (a4 / affair
                                                      :mod (i3 / internal)))
                                          :op4 (a5 / and
                                                :op1 (e2 / equal-01)

                                                      :mod (m2 / mutual)))
                                          :op5 (c2 / coexist-01
                                                :manner (p2 / peaceful)))))))
            :mod (p3 / politics))
      :op2 (p4 / pre-condition-00
            :ARG1 a6
            :ARG2 e))

# ::id nw.chtb_0052.15 ::date 2012-11-21T13:33:21 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt That all countries strengthen their mutual benefits and cooperation in the field of economy , open up to each other , eliminate inequalities and discriminatory policies in economic and trade transactions , gradually narrow the development gaps between countries and strive for joint prosperity is the economic basis for global and regional security .
# ::save-date Thu Dec 19, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0052_15.txt

      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (s / security
                  :mod (g / globe))
            :op2 (s4 / security
                  :mod (r / region)))
      :ARG2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (s2 / strengthen-01
                  :ARG0 (c / country
                        :quant (a3 / all))
                  :ARG1 (a4 / and
                        :op1 (b2 / benefit-01
                              :ARG1 c)
                        :op2 (c2 / cooperate-01
                              :ARG0 c)
                        :mod (m / mutual)
                        :mod (e2 / economy)))
            :op2 (o / open-03
                  :ARG1 c
                  :ARG3 c)
            :op3 (e3 / eliminate-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (a5 / and
                        :op1 (e4 / equal-01 :polarity -)
                        :op2 (p / policy
                              :ARG0-of (d / discriminate-02)))
                  :ARG2 (a6 / and
                        :op1 (t / transact-01
                              :mod (e5 / economy))
                        :op2 (t3 / transact-01
                              :mod (t2 / trade-01))))
            :op4 (n / narrow-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (g2 / gap
                        :mod (d2 / develop-02)
                        :location (b3 / between
                              :op1 c))
                  :manner (g3 / gradual))
            :op4 (s3 / strive-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (p2 / prosper-01
                        :ARG0 c
                        :manner (j / joint))))
      :mod (e / economy))

# ::id nw.chtb_0052.16 ::date 2012-11-21T13:48:24 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :mod (r / realistic)
      :manner-of (e / ensure-01
            :ARG1 (a6 / and
                  :op1 (p4 / peace)
                  :op2 (s2 / security)))
      :domain (a3 / and

                        :quant (a / all))

                        :op1 (u / understand-01
                              :mod (m / mutual))
                        :op2 (t / trust-02))
                  :manner (a4 / and
                        :op1 (d / dialogue)
                        :op2 (c2 / cooperate-01)))
            :op2 (p2 / promise-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG2 (s / settle-02
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 (a5 / and
                              :op1 (d2 / dispute-01
                                    :ARG0 c)
                              :op2 (c3 / conflict-01
                                    :ARG0 c))
                        :manner (p3 / peaceful)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0052.17 ::date 2012-11-21T13:55:01 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt This year some countries in eastern Asia encountered financial turmoil and have had some difficulties in their economic development , but the economic basis of east Asian countries is still good and advantageous factors for economic development still exist .
# ::save-date Thu Dec 19, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0052_17.txt
(h2 / have-concession-91
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (g / good
                  :domain (t3 / thing
                        :ARG2-of (b / base-02
                              :ARG0 (c4 / country
                                    :location w))
                        :mod e3)
                  :mod (s3 / still))
            :op2 (e4 / exist-01
                  :ARG1 (f2 / factor
                        :mod (a2 / advantage)
                        :beneficiary (d3 / develop-02
                              :ARG1 e3))
                  :mod (s4 / still)))
      :ARG2 (a3 / and
            :op1 (e / encounter-01
                  :ARG0 (c2 / country
                        :quant (s / some)
                        :location (w / world-region :wiki "East_Asia"
                              :name (n / name :op1 "Eastern" :op2 "Asia")))
                  :ARG1 (t / turmoil
                        :mod (f / finance)))
            :op2 (h / have-03
                  :ARG0 c2
                  :ARG1 (d / difficulty
                        :quant (s2 / some)
                        :topic (d2 / develop-02

                              :ARG1 (e3 / economy)))))
      :time (y / year
            :mod (t2 / this)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0052.19 ::date 2012-11-21T15:15:39 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :ARG1 e)
                  :direction (f / forward))
            :mod (d / definite)
            :time (a / after
                  :op1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (r / review-01
                              :ARG1 (e2 / experience))
                        :op2 (i / implement-01
                              :ARG1 (a3 / adjust-01
                                    :mod (p / proper)))))))

                  :purpose (a / and
                        :op1 (s2 / safeguard-01
                              :ARG0 w
                              :ARG1 (b / benefit-01
                                    :ARG1 (p2 / person
                                          :poss (c4 / country
                                                :quant (a2 / all)
                                                :location w2))

                                    :mod (l / lofty)

# ::id nw.chtb_0052.23 ::date 2012-11-21T15:59:59 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt He emphatically pointed out that " We should uphold the principles of mutual respect , equal participation , mutual benefit , and co-development ; we should strengthen cooperation in economy and technology , especially in the field of new high level technology , and establish reasonable regional economic structures , and form a mode of economic cooperation on the basis of learning from others ' strengths and offsetting others ' weaknesses , and mutual benefiting from advantages , balancing interests , and practicing non-exclusiveness and non-discrimination ; and we should strengthen trust , broaden common understanding , seek common points while maintaining differences , and resolve disputes appropriately through friendly dialogue and consultation to guarantee the region 's peace and stability . "
# ::save-date Tue Apr 15, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0052_23.txt
(p / point-02
      :ARG0 (h / he)
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (r / recommend-01
                  :ARG0 h
                  :ARG1 (u / uphold-01
                        :ARG0 (w / we)
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (p2 / principle
                                    :mod (r2 / respect-01
                                          :mod (m / mutual)))
                              :op2 (p7 / principle
                                    :mod (p3 / participate-01
                                          :ARG1-of (e2 / equal-01)))
                              :op3 (p8 / principle
                                    :mod (b / benefit-01
                                          :mod (m2 / mutual)))
                              :op4 (p9 / principle
                                    :mod (c / co-develop-00)))))
            :op2 (r3 / recommend-01
                  :ARG0 h
                  :ARG1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (s / strengthen-01
                              :ARG0 w
                              :ARG1 (c2 / cooperate-01
                                    :ARG0 w
                                    :ARG2 (a4 / and
                                          :op1 (e3 / economy)
                                          :op2 (t / technology
                                                :ARG2-of (i2 / include-91
                                                      :ARG1 (t2 / technology
                                                            :mod (n / new)
                                                            :mod (l / level
                                                                  :mod (h2 / high))
                                                            :mod (e8 / especially)))))))
                        :op2 (e4 / establish-01
                              :ARG0 w
                              :ARG1 (s2 / structure
                                    :mod (e5 / economy)
                                    :mod (r4 / reasonable)
                                    :mod (r5 / region)))
                        :op3 (f / form-01
                              :ARG0 w
                              :ARG1 (c3 / cooperate-01
                                    :ARG2 (e6 / economy)
                                    :mod (m3 / mode)
                                    :ARG1-of (b2 / base-02
                                          :ARG2 (a6 / and
                                                :op1 (l2 / learn-01
                                                      :ARG2 (s3 / strength
                                                            :poss (o / other)))
                                                :op2 (o2 / offset-01
                                                      :ARG1 (w2 / weakness
                                                            :poss o))
                                                :op3 (b3 / benefit-01
                                                      :ARG0 (a5 / advantage)
                                                      :mod (m4 / mutual))
                                                :op4 (b4 / balance-01
                                                      :ARG1 (i / interest))
                                                :op5 (p4 / practice-01
                                                      :ARG1 (a7 / and
                                                            :op1 (e7 / exclusive :polarity -)
                                                            :op2 (d / discriminate-02 :polarity -)))))))))
            :op3 (r6 / recommend-01
                  :ARG0 h
                  :ARG1 (a8 / and
                        :op1 (s4 / strengthen-01
                              :ARG0 w
                              :ARG1 (t3 / trust-01))
                        :op2 (b5 / broaden-01
                              :ARG0 w
                              :ARG1 (u2 / understand-01
                                    :mod (c5 / common)))
                        :op3 (s5 / seek-01
                              :ARG0 w
                              :ARG1 (p5 / point
                                    :mod c5)
                              :time (m5 / maintain-01
                                    :ARG0 w
                                    :ARG1 (d2 / differ-01)))
                        :op4 (r7 / resolve-01
                              :ARG0 w
                              :ARG1 (d3 / dispute-01)
                              :manner (a9 / appropriate)
                              :manner (a10 / and
                                    :op1 (d4 / dialogue
                                          :ARG1-of (f2 / friendly-41))
                                    :op2 (c4 / consult-01))
                              :purpose (g / guarantee-01
                                    :ARG0 w
                                    :ARG1 (a11 / and
                                          :op1 (p6 / peace)
                                          :op2 (s8 / stability)
                                          :poss r8)
                                    :ARG2 (r8 / region))))))
      :manner (e / emphasis))

# ::id nw.chtb_0054.2 ::date 2012-11-21T16:03:38 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :name (n6 / name :op1 "National" :op2 "Development" :op3 "Bank")))
            :ARG1 (p / project
                  :ARG0-of (t2 / transform-01
                        :ARG1 (c6 / company :wiki "Chang'an_Automobile_Group"
                              :name (n7 / name :op1 "Chang'an" :op2 "Auto" :op3 "Stock" :op4 "Co." :op5 "Ltd.")
                              :location (c7 / city :wiki "Chongqing"
                                    :name (n8 / name :op1 "Chongqing")))

                              :mod (p2 / produce-01
                                    :ARG0 c6
                                    :ARG1 (c / car-make :quant 150000 :wiki "Chang'an_Automobile_Group"
                                          :name (n2 / name :op1 "Chang'an" :op2 "Auto")
                                          :mod (l / luxury))))
                        :mod (t / technical))))
      :op2 (a3 / approve-01
            :ARG0 a2
            :ARG1 p)
      :time (b / before
            :op1 (n / now)
            :quant (f / few
                  :op1 (t3 / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                        :unit (d / day)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0054.3 ::date 2012-11-28T12:35:21 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The total investment value of this compact car project is 4.3 billion yuan and by the end of 1999 , it will first reach a production capability of 100,000 cars and 180,000 engines , and by the end of 2001 have a production capability of 150,000 luxury cars and 240,000 engines .
# ::save-date Fri Jan 10, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0054_3.txt

      :op1 (v / value-01
            :ARG1 (p / project
                  :mod (c / car
                        :ARG1-of (c2 / compact-01))
                  :mod (t2 / this))

                  :unit (y2 / yuan)
                  :ARG2-of (t / total-01))
            :mod (i / invest-01))
      :op2 (r / reach-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (c3 / capable-41
                  :ARG1 p
                  :ARG2 (p2 / produce-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (c4 / car :quant 100000)
                              :op2 (e / engine :quant 180000))))
            :time (b / by
                  :op1 (e2 / end
                        :op1 (d / date-entity :year 1999)))
            :time (f / first))
      :op3 (c5 / capable-41
            :ARG1 p
            :ARG2 (p3 / produce-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (c6 / car :quant 150000
                              :mod (l / luxury))
                        :op2 (e3 / engine :quant 240000)))
            :time (b2 / by
                  :op1 (e4 / end
                        :op1 (d2 / date-entity :year 2001)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0054.4 ::date 2012-12-17T15:51:27 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt From January to November of this year , a total number of 100,000 Chang'an compact cars have been produced , increasing by 54.9 % compared to the same period last year .
# ::save-date Tue May 20, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0054_4.txt
(p2 / produce-01
      :ARG1 (c2 / car :quant 100000
            :ARG1-of (c / compact-01)
            :mod (c4 / company :wiki "Chang'an_Automobile_Group"
                  :name (n / name :op1 "Chang'an"))
            :ARG2-of (t2 / total-01))
      :ARG1-of (i / increase-01
            :ARG2 (p3 / percentage-entity :value 54.9)
            :compared-to (d / date-interval
                  :op1 (d2 / date-entity :month 1
                        :mod (y / year
                              :mod (l / last)))
                  :op2 (d3 / date-entity :month 11
                        :mod y)))
      :time (d4 / date-interval
            :op1 (d5 / date-entity :month 1
                  :mod (y2 / year
                        :mod (t / this)))
            :op2 (d6 / date-entity :month 11
                  :mod y2)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0058.5 ::date 2012-11-28T14:21:18 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                                          :manner (s2 / special)))))
                  :ARG1 (e / everything)
                  :manner (o / order))
            :op2 (i / implement-01
                  :ARG1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (g3 / guideline
                              :topic (a6 / and
                                    :op1 (c / country :quant 1)
                                    :op2 (s3 / system :quant 2)))
                        :op1 (g5 / guideline
                              :mod (a5 / autonomy
                                    :degree (h3 / high)))
                        :op2 (g4 / guideline
                              :mod (a4 / administrate-01
                                    :ARG0 (p3 / person
                                          :mod c2)
                                    :ARG1 c2)))
                  :manner (e2 / effective))
            :duration (n3 / nearly
                  :op1 (t / temporal-quantity :quant "1/2"
                        :unit (y / year))
                  :time (s4 / since
                        :op1 (r2 / return-01
                              :ARG1 c2)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0058.6 ::date 2012-11-28T14:22:22 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The special administrative region of Hong Kong maintained a good phase of prosperity and stabilization .
# ::save-date Thu Dec 19, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0058_6.txt
(m / maintain-01
      :ARG0 (r / region :wiki "Hong_Kong"
            :name (n / name :op1 "Hong" :op2 "Kong")
            :mod (a / administrate-01)
            :mod (s / special))
      :ARG1 (p / phase
            :mod (g / good)
            :mod (p2 / prosper-01)
            :mod (s2 / stabilize-01)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0058.10 ::date 2012-11-28T14:59:12 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                                    :mod (s / so)))))

                              :mod (b / both)))
                  :manner (a5 / active))
            :ARG1-of (b2 / begin-01
                  :time (y / year
                        :mod (t2 / this))))
      :mod (a / also))

# ::id nw.chtb_0064.1 ::date 2012-11-28T15:37:06 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Huiliang Bai , director of the National Pharmaceutical Management Bureau Office says that the areas of pharmaceutical industry in which China encourages foreign businesses to invest are : those that can meet the needs of domestic and foreign markets , upgrade product levels , expand foreign sales , increase exports and foreign currency earnings ; enterprises that can produce medicine that can not be produced by China but is urgently needed ; those that can introduce domestically needed advanced technology to reform old enterprises ; those that can introduce new high level technology , patent technology and products ; and those that bring advanced management experience .
# ::save-date Thu Dec 11, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0064_1.txt
(s / say-01
  :ARG0 (p2 / person
          :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Huiliang"
                  :op2 "Bai")
          :wiki -
          :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                     :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                             :name (n3 / name
                                     :op1 "National"
                                     :op2 "Pharmaceutical"
                                     :op3 "Management"
                                     :op4 "Bureau"
                                     :op5 "Office")
                             :wiki -)
                     :ARG2 (d / director)))
  :ARG1 (a / area
          :mod (i2 / industry
                 :mod (p3 / pharmacy))
          :ARG2-of (i / invest-01
                     :ARG0 b
                     :ARG2-of (e / encourage-01
                                :ARG0 (c3 / country
                                        :name (n4 / name
                                                :op1 "China")
                                        :wiki "China")
                                :ARG1 (b / business
                                        :mod (f / foreign))))
          :domain (a2 / and
                    :op1 (a9 / area
                           :ARG0-of (m / meet-01
                                      :ARG1 (t6 / thing
                                              :ARG1-of (n5 / need-01
                                                         :ARG0 (a3 / and
                                                                 :op1 (m2 / market
                                                                        :mod (d2 / domestic))
                                                                 :op2 (m5 / market
                                                                        :mod f))))
                                      :mod (p4 / possible))
                           :ARG0-of (u / upgrade-02
                                      :ARG1 (l / level
                                              :mod (p5 / product))
                                      :mod p4)
                           :ARG0-of (e2 / expand-01
                                      :ARG1 (s2 / sell-01
                                              :mod f)
                                      :mod p4)
                           :ARG0-of (i3 / increase-01
                                      :ARG1 (a5 / and
                                              :op1 (e3 / export-01)
                                              :op2 (e4 / earn-01
                                                     :ARG3 (c4 / currency
                                                             :mod f)))
                                      :mod p4))
                    :op2 (e5 / enterprise
                           :ARG0-of (p7 / produce-01
                                      :ARG1 (m3 / medicine
                                              :ARG1-of (p8 / produce-01
                                                         :ARG0 c3
                                                         :mod (p9 / possible
                                                                :polarity -))
                                              :ARG1-of (n7 / need-01
                                                         :manner (u2 / urgent)))
                                      :mod p4))
                    :op3 (a4 / area
                           :ARG0-of (i4 / introduce-02
                                      :ARG1 (t2 / technology
                                              :ARG1-of (a6 / advance-01)
                                              :ARG1-of (n / need-01
                                                         :mod (d3 / domestic)))
                                      :purpose (r / reform-01
                                                 :ARG0 t2
                                                 :ARG1 (e6 / enterprise
                                                         :mod (o / old)))
                                      :mod p4))
                    :op4 (a10 / area
                           :ARG0-of (i5 / introduce-02
                                      :ARG1 (a7 / and
                                              :op1 (t3 / technology
                                                     :mod (l2 / level
                                                            :mod (h / high)))
                                              :op2 (t4 / technology
                                                     :mod (p11 / patent))
                                              :op3 p5
                                              :mod (n8 / new))
                                      :mod p4))
                    :op5 (a11 / area
                           :ARG0-of (b2 / bring-01
                                      :ARG1 (e7 / experience
                                              :mod (m4 / manage-01)
                                              :ARG1-of (a8 / advance-01)))))))

                        :mod (o / other)
                        :example (a2 / and
                              :op1 (t / trade-01
                                    :ARG0-of (c5 / compensate-01))
                              :op2 (t2 / trade-01
                                    :ARG0-of (l / license-01))

                                          :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity :value 3)))

                                    :ARG1 (t5 / technology))

                                    :ARG1 (p3 / product
                                          :mod (n2 / new))
                                    :manner (j / joint)))))
            :mod (a / also)
            :ARG2-of (e2 / except-01
                  :ARG1 (w3 / welcome-01
                        :ARG0 g
                        :ARG1 (i / invest-01)))))

                  :mod (o2 / once)))

      :ARG0 (i / it)
      :ARG1 (a / and

                  :domain (r / rate
                        :mod (g / grow-01

                                    :mod (w / world))))
                  :time (y / year
                        :mod (t / this)))

                  :ARG1 r
                  :ARG4 (p4 / percentage-entity :value 3.5)
                  :time (y2 / year
                        :mod (n2 / next)))
            :op3 (g2 / grow-01
                  :manner (s / slow
                        :degree (m / most)
                        :compared-to (b / before
                              :op1 (n / now)
                              :quant (t3 / temporal-quantity :quant 5
                                    :unit (y3 / year))))
                  :time y)))

                  :ARG2 (o2 / official)))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (h2 / high
                  :degree (m2 / more
                        :degree (f2 / far))

                        :op1 (r4 / rate
                              :mod (g4 / grow-01

                        :name (n / name :op1 "Southeast" :op2 "Asia")))
            :ARG2 (p / percentage-entity :value 28)
            :time (d / date-entity :year 1997)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0110.3 ::date 2012-11-21T13:16:35 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Up till October of last year , Finland 's export volume to major trading partners , such as Hong Kong , China , Indonesia , Thailand , Singapore , Malaysia etc. , reached 10.7 billion Finland Marks ( 1 Finland Mark approximates 0.19 US dollar ) , which was equivalent to gross exports of the whole year of 1996 .
# ::save-date Thu Dec 19, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0110_3.txt
(m5 / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / reach-01
            :ARG0 (v / volume
                  :quant-of (e / export-01
                        :ARG0 (c / country :wiki "Finland"

                                    :ARG0 c)
                              :mod (t2 / trade-01)
                              :mod (m2 / major)

                                    :op1 (c2 / city :wiki "Hong_Kong"
                                          :name (n / name :op1 "Hong" :op2 "Kong"))
                                    :op2 (c3 / country :wiki "China"

                                          :name (n6 / name :op1 "Indonesia"))
                                    :op4 (c5 / country :wiki "Thailand"
                                          :name (n5 / name :op1 "Thailand"))
                                    :op5 (c6 / country :wiki "Singapore"
                                          :name (n4 / name :op1 "Singapore"))
                                    :op6 (c7 / country :wiki "Malaysia"
                                          :name (n3 / name :op1 "Malaysia"))
                                    :op7 (e2 / et-cetera)))))
            :ARG1 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 10700000000
                  :ARG1-of (e3 / equal-01

                                    :mod (w / whole))))
                  :unit (m7 / mark
                        :mod c))

                        :mod (y / year
                              :mod (l / last)))))

                  :unit (m3 / mark
                        :mod c))

                              :name (n2 / name :op1 "US"))))))

                              :location (d / domestic))
                        :ARG2 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (i4 / institution
                                    :location (w / within

                                          :mod (i6 / individual))
                                    :op4 (o3 / organization
                                          :mod (o4 / other)
                                          :mod (e2 / economy))
                                    :location (a3 / abroad))))

                              :mod (f4 / foreign))

# ::id nw.chtb_0119.4 ::date 2012-11-28T13:08:34 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                                                      :ARG0 b2
                                                      :location (o6 / offshore)))))))
                  :op5 (f / finance-01
                        :ARG1 (p / project))
                  :op6 (f2 / finance-01
                        :prep-under (p2 / project
                              :duration (o8 / over
                                    :op1 (t6 / temporal-quantity :quant 90

                              :mod (t3 / trade-01)))

                        :ARG1 e5

                              :mod (o / other)))

      :op2 (m / manage-01

                  :mod (i / international))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0119.9 ::date 2012-11-28T15:03:46 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Juridical people of non-financial institutions who borrow international commercial loans directly must possess these several conditions , that is , have continual profits for the last three years , have import and export business permission , belong to a national encouraged industry ; possess a complete financial management system ; must have a ratio of net assets to total assets not lower than 15 % for juridical people of trade - type non-financial corporations , must have ratios of net assets to total assets not lower than 30 % for juridical people of non trade - type non-financial corporations ; must have a total sum of international business loans borrowed and foreign guarantee surpluses not exceeding 50 % of net asset 's equivalent foreign exchange worth ; must have total of foreign exchange loan and foreign exchange guarantee surplus not exceeding the amount of exchange created in the previous year .
# ::save-date Thu Dec 19, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0119_9.txt

                        :mod (f / financial :polarity -)))
            :mod (j / juridical))

                  :mod (t3 / this)
                  :quant (s / several)

                        :ARG1 (a2 / and

      :ARG1 (f2 / fall-01

                  :mod (g / grow-01
                        :ARG1 (e / economy

                              :mod (t / this)))
                  :mod (r2 / real))
            :ARG3 (p / percentage-entity :value 3.9
                  :time (d / date-entity :year 1997))
            :ARG4 (p2 / percentage-entity :value 3)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0131.3 ::date 2012-11-29T10:02:11 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Engelan said at the economy figures colloquium , organized by the France - Ivory Coast Merchant Club , that the economic growth rate of each member state of the West Africa Economic and Currency Union has already recovered 5.9 % in 1996 , increased to 6.3 % in 1997 , while this growth rate in 1994 was only 2.6 % .
# ::save-date Thu Dec 19, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0131_3.txt

            :name (n3 / name :op1 "Engelan"))

            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (r / recover-01
                        :ARG1 (r2 / rate
                              :mod (g / grow-01
                                    :ARG1 (e2 / economy))
                              :poss (s2 / state
                                    :mod (e3 / each)
                                    :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG1 (o3 / organization :wiki -
                                                :name (n2 / name :op1 "West" :op2 "Africa" :op3 "Economic" :op4 "and" :op5 "Currency" :op6 "Union"))
                                          :ARG2 (m / member))))
                        :time (a2 / already)
                        :quant (p2 / percentage-entity :value 5.9)
                        :time (d / date-entity :year 1996))
                  :op2 (i / increase-01
                        :ARG0 r2
                        :ARG4 (p3 / percentage-entity :value 6.3)
                        :time (d2 / date-entity :year 1997)))
            :ARG2 (p6 / percentage-entity :value 2.6
                  :mod (o4 / only)
                  :domain r2
                  :time (d3 / date-entity :year 1994)))
      :location (c2 / colloquium
            :ARG1-of (o / organize-01
                  :ARG0 (o2 / organization :wiki -
                        :name (n / name :op1 "France" :op2 "Ivory" :op3 "Coast" :op4 "Merchant" :op5 "Club")))
            :mod (f2 / figure
                  :mod (e / economy))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0131.4 ::date 2012-11-29T10:15:04 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :op1 (d / deficit
                              :mod (i3 / import-01)
                              :mod (e2 / export-01))
                        :op2 (s2 / situation
                              :mod (i4 / invest-01
                                    :mod (p / public))))
                  :ARG0-of (c / cause-01
                        :ARG1 (i2 / increase-01
                              :ARG1 (s3 / surplus
                                    :mod (t / trade-01))
                              :manner (d2 / drastic)))
                  :time (y / year
                        :mod (r2 / recent))
                  :degree (g / great)
                  :mod (a3 / also))
            :op2 (r / reduce-01
                  :ARG0 n
                  :ARG1 (d3 / deficit
                        :mod (b / budget-01))
                  :ARG4 (p3 / product-of
                        :op1 (p2 / percentage-entity :value 1.3)
                        :op2 (p4 / product
                              :poss (c3 / country
                                    :mod (e3 / each))
                              :mod (g3 / gross)
                              :mod (d5 / domestic))
                        :mod (o / only))
                  :time (t2 / time
                        :ARG1-of (s4 / same-41))
                  :degree (s5 / significant))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0131.6 ::date 2012-11-29T10:30:58 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                              :name (n / name :op1 "CFA")))

                        :ARG2 (d2 / depreciate-01
                              :ARG1 f
                              :extent (p2 / percentage-entity :value 50)
                              :time (d4 / date-entity :year 1994 :month 1)))
                  :manner (d3 / drastic))
            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (r2 / recover-01
                        :ARG1 (g / grow-01
                              :ARG1 (e / economy
                                    :poss (c3 / country
                                          :mod (e2 / each)
                                          :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                                :ARG1 (o / organization :wiki -
                                                      :name (n2 / name :op1 "West" :op2 "Africa" :op3 "Economic" :op4 "and" :op5 "Currency" :op6 "Union"))))))
                        :time (a / already)
                        :ARG1-of (o2 / obvious-41)
                        :duration (s2 / short)))))

                  :unit (y / yuan)))

                                                :mod (p7 / province)))))))

                  :time (d2 / date-entity :year 1992))
            :ARG4 (p3 / percentage-entity :value 17))

# ::id nw.chtb_0133.12 ::date 2012-11-30T08:02:16 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The areas in which Liaoning utilizes foreign investment have been expanded from medium and small - sized processing projects to the four pillar industries for old industrial base transformation purposes : the petrochemical industry , the metallurgical industry , the mechanical industry , the electronic industry , etc. and such industries as agriculture , real estate , infrastructure , energy , finance , etc .
# ::save-date Thu Dec 19, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0133_12.txt
(e / expand-01
      :ARG1 (a / area
            :location-of (u / utilize-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / province :wiki "Liaoning"
                        :name (n / name :op1 "Liaoning"))
                  :ARG1 (i3 / invest-01
                        :mod (f / foreign))))
      :ARG3 (a5 / and
            :op1 (p / project
                  :ARG1-of (s / size-01
                        :ARG2 (s2 / small)))
            :op2 (p6 / project
                  :ARG1-of (s3 / size-01
                        :ARG2 (m / medium)))
            :topic (p3 / process-01))
      :ARG4 (a2 / and
            :op1 (i / industry :quant 4
                  :mod (p4 / pillar)
                  :purpose (t / transform-01
                        :ARG1 (b / base
                              :mod (i4 / industry)
                              :mod (o / old)))
                  :domain (a6 / and
                        :op1 (i5 / industry
                              :mod (p5 / petrochemical))
                        :op2 (i6 / industry
                              :mod (m2 / metallurgy))
                        :op3 (i7 / industry
                              :mod (m3 / mechanics))
                        :op4 (i8 / industry
                              :mod (e2 / electronic))
                        :op5 (e6 / et-cetera)))
            :op2 (i2 / industry
                  :example (a3 / and
                        :op1 (a4 / agriculture)
                        :op2 (e3 / estate
                              :mod (r / real))
                        :op3 (i9 / infrastructure)
                        :op4 (e4 / energy)
                        :op5 (f2 / finance-01)
                        :op6 (e5 / et-cetera)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0134.2 ::date 2012-12-02T17:45:44 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Vice-minister of China 's External Trade and Economic Co-operation Ministry and concurrent Chief Negotiation Representative Yongtu Long expressed in Washington on the 20th that the two countries , the US and China , must co-operate closely , in an active and realistic spirit , appropriately managing trade imbalances between the US and China and other trade disputes , to create good external conditions for further development of healthy and stable economic and trade relations between the two countries .
# ::save-date Fri Dec 20, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0134_2.txt

                              :name (n6 / name :op1 "China")))
                  :ARG2 (m / minister
                        :mod (v / vice)))

                  :ARG1 (n3 / negotiate-01)
                  :mod (c2 / chief)
                  :mod (c3 / concurrent)))
      :ARG1 (a2 / and
            :op1 (o / obligate-01
                  :ARG1 (c6 / cooperate-01
                        :ARG0 (c8 / country :wiki "United_States"
                              :name (n5 / name :op1 "US"))
                        :ARG1 c
                        :manner (c7 / close)
                        :manner (s / spirit
                              :mod (a / active)
                              :mod (r2 / realistic))))
            :op2 (m2 / manage-01
                  :ARG0 (a3 / and
                        :op1 c8
                        :op2 c)
                  :ARG1 (a7 / and
                        :op1 (b / balance-01 :polarity -
                              :ARG1 (t / trade-01
                                    :ARG0 c8
                                    :ARG2 c))
                        :op2 (d2 / dispute-01
                              :ARG2 (t2 / trade-01)
                              :mod (o2 / other)))
                  :manner (a5 / appropriate))
            :purpose (c4 / create-01
                  :ARG0 a3
                  :ARG1 (t3 / thing
                        :ARG2-of (c10 / condition-01
                              :ARG1 (d3 / develop-02
                                    :ARG1 (r3 / relation
                                          :mod (e3 / economy)
                                          :mod (t4 / trade-01)
                                          :manner (h / health)
                                          :manner (s2 / stability)
                                          :mod (b2 / between
                                                :op1 c8
                                                :op2 c))
                                    :degree (f / further)))
                        :mod (g2 / good)
                        :mod (e2 / external))))
      :location (c5 / city :wiki "Washington,_D.C."
            :name (n4 / name :op1 "Washington"))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 20))

# ::id nw.chtb_0134.4 ::date 2012-12-02T18:22:18 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt He said , current world economic globalization is developing deeply , investment flow is faster than trade flow , overseas investment and sales volumes of large western countries have greatly exceeded local import values , the proportion of foreign investments replacing direct imports is significantly increasing .
# ::save-date Fri Dec 20, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0134_4.txt

      :ARG0 (h / he)
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (d / develop-01

                        :ARG1 (e2 / economy
                              :mod (w / world)))
                  :manner (d2 / deep)
                  :time (c / current))

                  :domain (f2 / flow-01
                        :mod (i2 / invest-01))
                  :compared-to (f3 / flow-01
                        :mod (t3 / trade-01))
                  :degree (m / more))
            :op3 (e / exceed-01
                  :ARG0 (v / volume
                        :poss (c2 / country
                              :mod (l2 / large)
                              :mod (w2 / world-region :wiki "Western_world"
                                    :name (n / name :op1 "West")))
                        :quant-of (a2 / and
                              :op1 (i4 / invest-01
                                    :location (o / overseas))
                              :op2 (s2 / sell-01
                                    :location o)))
                  :ARG1 (t4 / thing
                        :ARG2-of (v2 / value-01
                              :ARG1 (i3 / import-01
                                    :mod (l / local))))
                  :degree (g2 / great))
            :op4 (i / increase-01
                  :ARG1 (p / proportion
                        :quant-of (i7 / invest-01
                              :mod (f4 / foreign))
                        :ARG2-of (r / replace-01
                              :ARG1 (i5 / import-01
                                    :manner (d3 / direct))))
                  :ARG2 (s3 / significant))))

                  :op1 (u2 / use-01
                        :ARG1 (m2 / method
                              :mod (b / balance-01
                                    :ARG1 (a2 / and
                                          :op1 (i3 / income
                                                :source (t4 / trade-01))
                                          :op2 (t3 / thing
                                                :source t4
                                                :ARG0-of (e / expend-01))))

                                    :mod (t6 / trade-01)

                                          :op1 (c3 / country))))
                        :ARG1-of (c2 / continue-01))
                  :op2 (r / reality))
            :time (a3 / already))
      :prep-under (c / circumstance
            :mod (t / this)))

                                    :mod c2)))

                              :ARG1 c2

            :dayperiod (a / afternoon))

            :ARG0 h

                  :mod (a2 / another))))

                        :ARG2 (c2 / city :wiki "Tianjin"

# ::id nw.chtb_0136.3 ::date 2012-12-02T20:44:34 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :op1 (r / reach-01
            :ARG0 (r2 / revenue
                  :source (s / sell-01)

                        :mod (c2 / capital

                                    :name (n3 / name :op1 "Taiwan")))

                              :ARG1 (o / operate-01
                                    :ARG0 c)
                              :time (y / year
                                    :mod (l / last)))
                        :quant (m4 / more-than :op1 420)))
            :ARG1 (m3 / monetary-quantity :quant 6700000000
                  :unit (y3 / yuan
                        :mod (r3 / RMB))
                  :ARG2-of (i / include-91
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (p / profit-01
                                    :ARG0 c
                                    :mod (m / monetary-quantity :quant 200000000
                                          :unit (y2 / yuan
                                                :mod r3)))
                              :op2 (e / export-01
                                    :mod (m2 / monetary-quantity :quant 150000000
                                          :unit (d4 / dollar
                                                :mod (c4 / country :wiki "United_States"
                                                      :name (n / name :op1 "US")))))))))
      :duration (d / date-interval
            :op1 (d2 / date-entity :month 1)
            :op2 (d3 / date-entity :month 11)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0136.7 ::date 2012-12-03T16:42:47 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Fujin Carpentry Company , which started in the wood processing industry in Tianjin , has successively implemented graft reform of more than 20 state - owned corporations in the motherland mainland in recent years , charting a route of expanding inexpensively and developing rapidly , becoming the " Fujin phenomenon " widely commended in the economic arena .
# ::save-date Sat Dec 7, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0136_7.txt

      :op1 (i / implement-01
            :ARG0 (c2 / company :wiki -
                  :name (n / name :op1 "Fujin" :op2 "Carpentry" :op3 "Company")

                        :location (i2 / industry
                              :mod (p / process-01
                                    :ARG1 (w / wood)))
                        :location (c3 / city :wiki "Tianjin"
                              :name (n3 / name :op1 "Tianjin"))))
            :ARG1 (r / reform-01
                  :ARG0 c2
                  :ARG1 (c4 / corporation
                        :quant (m / more-than :op1 20)
                        :ARG1-of (o / own-01
                              :ARG0 (s3 / state))
                        :location (m2 / mainland
                              :mod (m3 / motherland)))
                  :mod (g / graft))
            :manner (s2 / successive)
            :time (y / year
                  :mod (r2 / recent)))
      :op2 (c / chart-01
            :ARG0 c2
            :ARG1 (r3 / route
                  :consist-of (e / expand-01
                        :ARG1 c2
                        :manner (e3 / expensive :polarity -))
                  :consist-of (d / develop-02
                        :ARG1 c2
                        :manner (r4 / rapid))))
      :op3 (b / become-01
            :ARG1 c2
            :ARG2 (t / thing :wiki -
                  :name (n4 / name :op1 "Fujin" :op2 "Phenomenon")
                  :ARG1-of (c5 / commend-01
                        :manner (w2 / wide)
                        :location (a2 / arena
                              :mod (e2 / economy))))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0136.8 ::date 2012-12-03T17:11:07 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Director of Tianjin 's Taiwanese Affair Department , Gengxin Qu said , although there was a slowing down in the growth rate of Taiwanese merchants ' investments in Tianjin due to the hindrance of Taiwanese authorities last year , resulted in only 94 recently approved Taiwanese capital corporations and the total agreed investment value reaching 250 million US dollars which were both lower than that achieved in the previous year , but the quality and technological standards of investments both have further improvements .

                              :name (n5 / name :op1 "Tianjin")))
                  :ARG2 (d / director)))
      :ARG1 (h4 / have-concession-91
            :ARG1 (i / improve-01

                        :op1 (q / quality
                              :poss (i4 / invest-01))
                        :op2 (s3 / standard
                              :poss i4
                              :mod (t5 / technology)))
                  :degree (f / further))
            :ARG2 (s2 / slow-03
                  :ARG1 (r2 / rate
                        :mod (g2 / grow-01
                              :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                                    :ARG1-of (i2 / invest-01
                                          :ARG0 (p3 / person
                                                :mod (c5 / country :wiki "Taiwan"
                                                      :name (n3 / name :op1 "Taiwan"))
                                                :ARG0-of (m2 / merchandise-01))
                                          :location c))))
                  :ARG1-of (c4 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (h / hinder-01
                              :ARG0 (a7 / authority
                                    :mod c5)
                              :time (y2 / year
                                    :mod (l2 / last))))
                  :ARG1-of (r4 / result-01
                        :ARG2 (a / and
                              :op1 (a4 / approve-01
                                    :ARG1 (c3 / corporation
                                          :quant (o / only :op1 94)
                                          :mod (c6 / capital
                                                :source c5)
                                          :mod (l / low
                                                :degree (m / more)

                                                                  :mod (p2 / previous))))))
                                    :time (r3 / recent))

                                          :ARG1-of (i3 / invest-01

# ::id nw.chtb_0136.15 ::date 2012-12-03T19:43:43 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (m / measure

# ::id nw.chtb_0145.4 ::date 2012-12-03T19:49:59 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt This political bank , which has been established only three years , raised a loan of 100 million US dollars from banking syndicates for Shandong 's Qilu Ethylene 's Transformation and Expansion Project through the Asia Industry Bank Association Organization , and undertook the foreign financing of projects such as the first group of 14 water wheel sets on the left bank of the dam of the Yangtze River Three Gorges Water Power Station Project , the Qinshan Nuclear Power Station expansion project , the Ling'ao Nuclear Power Station , the Yellow River Xiaolangdi water conservancy hub , and the Ertan Water Power Station .

      :op1 (l / loan-01

                  :mod (b3 / bank))
