                        :mod (c2 / country :wiki "United_States"
                              :name (n10 / name :op1 "US"))))
            :ARG2 (b / bank
                  :mod (p / politics)
                  :ARG1-of (e / establish-01
                        :duration (t / temporal-quantity :quant 3
                              :unit (y / year)
                              :mod (o2 / only)))
                  :mod (t5 / this))
            :purpose (t3 / thing :wiki -
                  :name (n6 / name :op1 "Transformation" :op2 "and" :op3 "Expansion" :op4 "Project")
                  :poss (c3 / company :wiki -
                        :name (n7 / name :op1 "Qilu" :op2 "Ethylene")
                        :location (p4 / province :wiki "Shandong"
                              :name (n9 / name :op1 "Shandong"))))
            :manner (o4 / organization :wiki -
                  :name (n8 / name :op1 "Asia" :op2 "Industry" :op3 "Bank" :op4 "Association" :op5 "Organization")))
      :op2 (u / undertake-01
            :ARG0 b
            :ARG1 (f / finance-01
                  :ARG1 (p2 / project
                        :example (a2 / and
                              :op1 (g / group
                                    :consist-of (s / set :quant 14
                                          :consist-of (w / wheel
                                                :mod (w2 / water)))
                                    :ord (o5 / ordinal-entity :value 1)
                                    :location (b2 / bank
                                          :mod (l2 / left)
                                          :part-of (d / dam
                                                :part-of (t4 / thing :wiki "Three_Gorges_Dam"
                                                      :name (n / name :op1 "Yangtze" :op2 "River" :op3 "Three" :op4 "Gorges" :op5 "Water" :op6 "Power" :op7 "Station" :op8 "Project")))))
                              :op2 (p3 / project
                                    :purpose (e2 / expand-01
                                          :ARG1 (f4 / facility :wiki "Qinshan_Nuclear_Power_Plant"
                                                :name (n2 / name :op1 "Qinshan" :op2 "Nuclear" :op3 "Power" :op4 "Station"))))
                              :op3 (f5 / facility :wiki "Ling_Ao_Nuclear_Power_Plant"
                                    :name (n3 / name :op1 "Ling'ao" :op2 "Nuclear" :op3 "Power" :op4 "Station"))

                              :op5 (f6 / facility :wiki "Ertan_Dam"
                                    :name (n4 / name :op1 "Ertan" :op2 "Water" :op3 "Power" :op4 "Station"))))
                  :mod (f2 / foreign))))

                              :purpose (t2 / trade-01
                                    :mod (f2 / foreign)))))

                  :unit (y / year))
            :manner (s / succeed-03))
      :op2 (h / high

                  :quant-of (t3 / trade-01
                        :ARG0 c3

                              :mod (l / last))

                  :extent (m2 / monetary-quantity :quant 17220000000
                        :unit (d / dollar
                              :mod c6)))

                  :quant-of (t4 / trade-01

                              :name (n / name :op1 "US")

# ::id nw.chtb_0149.6 ::date 2012-12-05T05:52:57 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt According to presentations , the dependency of China 's exported products on the Japanese market has been increasing annually , but the proportion of imported products in the total import volume from Japan has fluctuated irregularly ; the development of various trade methods was not balanced , general trade has decreased , processing trade has increased ; while the growth of primary product trade was considerably fast .

                                                :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))))
                              :ARG1 (m / market
                                    :mod (c4 / country :wiki "Japan"
                                          :name (n / name :op1 "Japan"))))
                        :frequency (r2 / rate-entity-91
                              :ARG2 (t9 / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                                    :unit (y2 / year))))
                  :ARG2 (f / fluctuate-01
                        :ARG1 (p3 / proportion
                              :quant-of (p4 / product
                                    :ARG1-of (i3 / import-01))
                              :ARG1-of (i5 / include-91
                                    :ARG2 (v / volume
                                          :quant-of (i4 / import-01
                                                :ARG2 c4)
                                          :ARG2-of (t / total-01))))
                        :ARG2 (r / regular :polarity -)))
            :op2 (c2 / contrast-01
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (b / balance-01 :polarity -
                              :ARG1 (d3 / develop-02
                                    :ARG1 (m2 / method
                                          :mod (v2 / various)
                                          :mod (t4 / trade-01))))
                        :op2 (d / decrease-01
                              :ARG1 (t5 / trade-01
                                    :mod (g / general)))
                        :op3 (i2 / increase-01
                              :ARG1 (t6 / trade-01
                                    :mod (p5 / process-01))))
                  :ARG2 (f2 / fast
                        :degree (c5 / considerable)
                        :domain (g2 / grow-01
                              :ARG1 (t7 / trade-01
                                    :ARG1 (p6 / product
                                          :mod (p7 / primary))))))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0157.4 ::date 2012-11-16T08:39:34 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt According to this , Guangzhou requested that this year the city 's per - capita income grow by 13 % compared with the last year ; industrial added - value grow by 13.5 % ( total industrial output grow by 15 % ) ; agricultural added - value grow by 5.5 % ( total agricultural output grow by 6.5 % ) ; tertiary production values added grow by 13.5 % ; municipal social fixed assets investments grow by 11 % ; total amount of social consumable retails grow by 15 % ; foreign trade exports grow by 5 % ; imports grow by 10 % ; actually utilized foreign investment grow by 8 % ; overall price levels of retail goods to be controlled within 6 % ; financial income within the budget to grow by 10 % , the rate of contribution of technology progress towards industrial economic growth to further increase by 1.8 % on the foundation of last year ; city - township registered unemployment rate to be controlled at below 3 % ; population natural growth rate to be controlled below 8.2 % . ]
# ::save-date Fri Dec 12, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0157_4.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (t / this)
      :ARG1 (r / request-01
            :ARG0 (c2 / city :wiki "Guangzhou" :name (n / name :op1 "Guangzhou"))
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (g2 / grow-01
                        :ARG1 (i / income
                              :mod (p17 / per-capita)
                              :poss c2
                              :time (y / year
                                    :mod (t2 / this)))
                        :ARG2 (p18 / percentage-entity :value 13
                              :compared-to (y2 / year
                                    :mod (l / last))))
                  :op2 (g4 / grow-01
                        :ARG1 (t10 / thing
                              :ARG2-of (v2 / value-01
                                    :ARG1 (i2 / industry))
                              :ARG1-of (a3 / add-03))
                        :ARG2 (p20 / percentage-entity :value 13.5))
                  :op3 (g5 / grow-01
                        :ARG1 (o / output
                              :mod (i3 / industry)
                              :ARG2-of (t4 / total-01))
                        :ARG2 (p21 / percentage-entity :value 15))
                  :op4 (g6 / grow-01
                        :ARG1 (t11 / thing
                              :ARG2-of (v3 / value-01
                                    :ARG1 (a4 / agriculture))
                              :ARG1-of (a5 / add-03))
                        :ARG2 (p22 / percentage-entity :value 5.5))
                  :op5 (g7 / grow-01
                        :ARG1 (o2 / output
                              :mod (a6 / agriculture)
                              :ARG2-of (t5 / total-01))
                        :ARG2 (p23 / percentage-entity :value 6.5))
                  :op6 (g3 / grow-01
                        :ARG1 (t12 / thing
                              :ARG2-of (v / value-01
                                    :ARG1 (p19 / produce-01
                                          :mod (t3 / tertiary)))
                              :ARG1-of (a2 / add-03))
                        :ARG2 (p12 / percentage-entity :value 13.5))
                  :op7 (g8 / grow-01
                        :ARG1 (i4 / invest-01
                              :ARG2 (a7 / asset
                                    :mod (m / municipal)
                                    :mod (s2 / social))
                              :ARG1-of (f / fix-03))
                        :ARG2 (p24 / percentage-entity :value 11))
                  :op8 (g9 / grow-01
                        :ARG1 (a8 / amount
                              :quant-of (r2 / retail
                                    :ARG1-of (c3 / consume-01
                                          :mod (s3 / social)))
                              :ARG2-of (t6 / total-01))
                        :ARG2 (p25 / percentage-entity :value 15))
                  :op9 (g / grow-01
                        :ARG1 (e / export-01
                              :mod (t7 / trade-01
                                    :mod (f2 / foreign)))
                        :ARG2 (p / percentage-entity :value 5))
                  :op10 (g10 / grow-01
                        :ARG1 (i5 / import-01)
                        :ARG2 (p2 / percentage-entity :value 10))
                  :op11 (g11 / grow-01
                        :ARG1 (i6 / invest-01
                              :ARG1-of (u / utilize-01
                                    :manner (a9 / actual))
                              :mod f2)
                        :ARG2 (p3 / percentage-entity :value 8))
                  :op12 (c / control-01
                        :ARG1 (l2 / level
                              :mod (p4 / price-01
                                    :ARG1 (g12 / good
                                          :ARG1-of (r3 / retail-01)))
                              :mod (o3 / overall))
                        :prep-within (p5 / percentage-entity :value 6))
                  :op13 (g13 / grow-01
                        :ARG1 (i7 / income
                              :mod (f4 / finance)
                              :prep-within (b / budget))
                        :ARG2 (p6 / percentage-entity :value 10))
                  :op14 (i8 / increase-01
                        :ARG1 (r4 / rate
                              :mod (c4 / contribute-01
                                    :ARG0 (p7 / progress-01
                                          :ARG1 (t8 / technology))
                                    :ARG2 (g14 / grow-01

                                                :mod (i9 / industry)))))
                        :ARG2 (p8 / percentage-entity :value 1.8)
                        :degree (f3 / further)
                        :ARG1-of (f5 / found-01
                              :ARG2 y2))
                  :op15 (c5 / control-01
                        :ARG1 (r5 / rate
                              :mod (e3 / employ-01 :polarity -
                                    :ARG1-of (r6 / register-02
                                          :ARG2 (t9 / township

                  :manner (f / fast))
            :ARG1 (d / develop-02

# ::id nw.chtb_0166.3 ::date 2012-11-20T12:55:43 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt This report predicted that by the year 2010 , the proportion that China 's economy accounts for in the world economy will rise from the current 2.5 % to 5 % or 6 % ; the proportion that China 's exports accounts for among total world exports will expand from the current 3 % to 10 % .
# ::save-date Sun Jan 12, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0166_3.txt
(p6 / predict-01
      :ARG0 (t / thing
            :ARG1-of (r / report-01)
            :mod (t2 / this))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (r2 / rise-01
                  :ARG1 (p4 / proportion
                        :quant-of (e2 / economy
                              :poss (c3 / country :wiki "China"
                                    :name (n / name :op1 "China")))
                        :ARG0-of (a2 / account-01
                              :ARG1 (e3 / economy
                                    :poss (w / world))))
                  :ARG3 (p8 / percentage-entity :value 2.5
                        :time c2)
                  :ARG4 (o / or
                        :op1 (p9 / percentage-entity :value 5)
                        :op2 (p10 / percentage-entity :value 6)))
            :op2 (e / expand-01
                  :ARG1 (p / proportion
                        :quant-of (e5 / export-01
                              :ARG0 c3)
                        :ARG0-of (a3 / account-01
                              :ARG1 (e4 / export-01
                                    :ARG0 (w2 / world)
                                    :ARG2-of (t3 / total-01))))
                  :ARG3 (p2 / percentage-entity :value 3
                        :time (c2 / current))
                  :ARG4 (p3 / percentage-entity :value 10))
            :time (b / by
                  :op1 (d2 / date-entity :year 2010))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0166.4 ::date 2012-11-20T13:49:47 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The report said , China 's rapid economic growth should not be viewed as a type of threat , but should be viewed as a positive ingredient helping to promote an Asia - Pacific region filled with life and developing .
# ::save-date Sun Dec 8, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0166_4.txt

      :ARG0 (t / thing

      :ARG1 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (r2 / recommend-01
                  :ARG1 (v / view-02 :polarity -
                        :ARG1 (g / grow-01
                              :ARG1 (c4 / country :wiki "China"
                                    :name (n / name :op1 "China"))
                              :manner (r4 / rapid)
                              :mod (e / economy))
                        :ARG2 (t2 / threaten-01
                              :ARG1 g
                              :mod (t3 / type))))
            :ARG2 (r3 / recommend-01
                  :ARG1 (v2 / view-02
                        :ARG1 g
                        :ARG2 (i / ingredient
                              :mod (p / positive)
                              :ARG0-of (h / help-01
                                    :ARG1 (p2 / promote-01
                                          :ARG0 g
                                          :ARG1 (w / world-region :wiki "Asia-Pacific"
                                                :name (n2 / name :op1 "Asia-Pacific")
                                                :ARG1-of (f / fill-01
                                                      :ARG2 (a2 / and
                                                            :op1 (l / life)
                                                            :op2 (d / develop-02
                                                                  :ARG1 w)))))))))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0166.5 ::date 2012-11-21T08:06:55 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                              :mod c))

                        :ARG0 a
                        :ARG2 (a2 / area

                                    :op1 (d / develop-02

                                                :mod (f / finance))

                                                :mod (f3 / full)))
                                    :op4 (e2 / et-cetera)))))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0166.6 ::date 2012-11-21T08:34:11 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri Dec 6, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0166_6.txt

      :ARG0 (t / thing

      :ARG1 (g / great
            :degree (v / very)
            :domain (p2 / possible
                  :domain (c / continue-01
                        :ARG0 (c2 / country :wiki "China"
                              :name (n / name :op1 "China"))
                        :ARG1 (m / maintain-01
                              :ARG0 c2
                              :ARG1 (r2 / rate
                                    :mod (g2 / grow-01
                                          :ARG1 (e / economy))
                                    :mod (p8 / percentage-entity
                                          :value (v2 / value-interval :op1 8 :op2 10)))))
                  :duration (a2 / after
                        :op1 (n2 / now)
                        :quant (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 10
                              :unit (y / year)
                              :mod (p6 / plus))))
            :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (a / and
                        :op1 (d / develop-02
                              :ARG1 (t3 / technology))
                        :op2 (r3 / rise-01
                              :ARG1 (p7 / productivity)))))
      :mod (a3 / also))

                        :name (n3 / name :op1 "Moscow")))

                  :domain (a3 / and

                                    :ARG1 (p5 / plasmodium)
                                    :location (m4 / mosquito)))
                        :op2 (k / kill-01

                              :ARG1 (m5 / mosquito)
                              :mod (a / also))))))

                  :ARG1-of (g / granulate-01))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0177.6 ::date 2012-12-04T06:48:17 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt This installation " was coated and camouflaged to avoid reconnaissance , but the evidence indicates that this was a military target . "
# ::save-date Thu Dec 19, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0177_6.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (c2 / coat-01
            :ARG1 (i2 / installation
                  :mod (t / this)))
      :op2 (c3 / camouflage-01
            :ARG1 i2)
      :purpose (a2 / avoid-01
            :ARG1 (r / reconnoiter-00
                  :ARG1 i2))
      :concession-of (i / indicate-01
            :ARG0 (t5 / thing
                  :ARG0-of (e / evidence-01))
            :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                  :ARG1-of (t3 / target-01)
                  :mod (m / military)
                  :domain i2)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0177.7 ::date 2012-12-04T07:27:58 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (p / publication :wiki "Xinhua_News_Agency"
            :name (n / name :op1 "Xinhua" :op2 "News" :op3 "Agency"))
      :location (c3 / city :wiki "London"
            :name (n2 / name :op1 "London"))
      :time (d3 / date-entity :month 2 :day 13))

# ::id nw.chtb_0177.8 ::date 2012-12-04T08:40:55 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Paoen , the BBC 's reporter stationed in Iraq 's capital , Baghdad , attested on the 13th that no evidence has shown that the air - raid shelter bombed in Baghdad by American bombers was an Iraqi military bunker .
# ::save-date Thu Apr 17, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0177_8.txt
(a2 / attest-01
      :ARG0 (p3 / person :wiki -
            :name (n2 / name :op1 "Pauen")
            :ARG1-of (s / station-01
                  :ARG2 (c2 / city :wiki "Baghdad"
                        :name (n4 / name :op1 "Baghdad")
                        :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (c4 / country :wiki "Iraq"
                                    :name (n5 / name :op1 "Iraq"))
                              :ARG2 (c3 / capital))))
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c / company :wiki "BBC"
                        :name (n3 / name :op1 "BBC"))
                  :ARG3 (r / report-01)))
      :ARG1 (e2 / evidence-01 :polarity -
            :ARG1 (b3 / bunker
                  :mod (m / military)
                  :domain (t / thing
                        :ARG2-of (s3 / shelter-01
                              :ARG3 (r2 / raid-01
                                    :mod (a / air)))
                        :ARG1-of (b4 / bomb-01
                              :ARG0 (p4 / person
                                    :mod (c7 / country :wiki "United_States"
                                          :name (n8 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))))
                        :location c2)
                  :mod c4))
      :time (d2 / date-entity :day 13))

# ::id nw.chtb_0177.9 ::date 2012-12-04T09:37:34 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The speech given by Pauen in the BBC TV news disproved what the American officials have claimed that this air - raid shelter was a camouflaged military bunker .
# ::save-date Thu Dec 19, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0177_9.txt
(d / disprove-01
      :ARG0 (s / speech
            :ARG1-of (g / give-01
                  :ARG0 (p3 / person :wiki -
                        :name (n2 / name :op1 "Pauen")))
            :medium (n / news
                  :mod (p2 / publication :wiki "BBC_Television"
                        :name (n4 / name :op1 "BBC" :op2 "TV"))))
      :ARG1 (c / claim-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c2 / country :wiki "United_States"
                              :name (n5 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))
                        :ARG2 (o / official)))
            :ARG1 (b2 / bunker
                  :mod (m / military)
                  :ARG1-of (c3 / camouflage-01)
                  :domain (t2 / thing
                        :ARG2-of (s2 / shelter-01
                              :ARG3 (r / raid-01
                                    :mod (a / air)))
                        :mod (t / this)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0177.10 ::date 2012-12-04T09:52:22 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Pauen had gone to the scene to gather news about the bombed air - raid shelter where around 400 civilians lost their lives .
# ::save-date Tue Dec 10, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0177_10.txt
(g / go-02
      :ARG0 (p3 / person :wiki -
            :name (n / name :op1 "Pauen"))
      :ARG4 (s / scene)
      :purpose (g2 / gather-01
            :ARG0 p3
            :ARG1 (n2 / news
                  :topic (t / thing
                        :ARG2-of (s2 / shelter-01
                              :ARG3 (r / raid-01
                                    :mod (a / air)))
                        :ARG1-of (b / bomb-01)
                        :location-of (l / lose-02
                              :ARG0 (c / civilian
                                    :quant (a2 / around :op1 400))
                              :ARG1 (l2 / life
                                    :poss c))))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0186.2 ::date 2012-12-05T08:21:55 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt According to reports from the " Star Newspaper " of South Africa , on the 12th the African National Assembly of South Africa and the South Africa government made a large breakthrough in resolving the disagreement on both sides on the issue of the African National Assembly stopping armed conflict .
# ::save-date Tue Dec 17, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0186_2.txt
(r / report-01
      :ARG0 (n / newspaper :wiki "The_Star_(South_Africa)"
            :name (n2 / name :op1 "Star" :op2 "Newspaper")
            :mod c5)
      :ARG1 (b / breakthrough-01
            :ARG0 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (g / government-organization :wiki "National_Assembly_of_South_Africa"
                        :name (n4 / name :op1 "African" :op2 "National" :op3 "Assembly")
                        :poss (c5 / country :wiki "South_Africa"
                              :name (n7 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Africa")))
                  :op2 (g2 / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 c5)))
            :ARG1 (r2 / resolve-01
                  :ARG1 (d2 / disagree-01
                        :ARG0 (s / side
                              :mod (b2 / both))
                        :ARG2 (s4 / stop-01
                              :ARG0 g
                              :ARG1 (c4 / conflict-01
                                    :mod (a / arm-01)))))
            :mod (l / large)
            :time (d / date-entity :day 12)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0186.3 ::date 2012-12-05T08:44:45 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt DeKlerk , president of South Africa , and Mandela , vice-chairman of the African National Assembly , after holding a meeting lasting 11 hours on the 12th in Capetown , issued a joint statement declaring that this problem has been resolved and both sides have achieved agreement on most views regarding this problem and have signed an agreement .
# ::save-date Thu Dec 19, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0186_3.txt
(i / issue-01
      :ARG0 (a2 / and
            :op1 (p / person :wiki "F._W._de_Klerk"
                  :name (n / name :op1 "DeKlerk")
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c3 / country :wiki "South_Africa"
                              :name (n2 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Africa"))
                        :ARG2 (p3 / president)))
            :op2 (p2 / person :wiki "Nelson_Mandela"
                  :name (n3 / name :op1 "Mandela")
                  :ARG0-of (h4 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (g2 / government-organization :wiki "National_Assembly_of_South_Africa"
                              :name (n4 / name :op1 "African" :op2 "National" :op3 "Assembly"))
                        :ARG2 (c / chairman
                              :mod (v / vice)))))
      :ARG1 (t3 / thing
            :mod (j / joint)
            :ARG0-of (s / state-01
                  :ARG1 (a4 / and
                        :op1 (r / resolve-01
                              :ARG1 (p4 / problem
                                    :mod (t4 / this)))
                        :op2 (a6 / and
                              :op1 (a / agree-01
                                    :ARG0 (s4 / side
                                          :mod (b / both))
                                    :ARG1 (v2 / view
                                          :quant (m3 / most)
                                          :topic p4))
                              :op2 (s2 / sign-02
                                    :ARG0 s4
                                    :ARG1 (a5 / agreement))))))
      :time (a3 / after
            :op1 (h2 / hold-04
                  :ARG0 a2
                  :ARG1 (m2 / meet-03
                        :duration (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 11
                              :unit (h3 / hour))
                        :time (d3 / date-entity :day 12)
                        :location (c5 / city :wiki "Cape_Town"
                              :name (n5 / name :op1 "Capetown"))))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0186.4 ::date 2012-12-05T09:07:01 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt This agreement will be published after receiving approval from the South African cabinet and the National Executive Council of the African National Assembly .
# ::save-date Thu Dec 19, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0186_4.txt
(p / publish-01
      :ARG1 (a / agreement
            :mod (t / this))
      :time (a3 / after
            :op1 (a4 / approve-01
                  :ARG0 (a5 / and
                        :op1 (g3 / government-organization :wiki "Cabinet_of_South_Africa"
                              :name (n / name :op1 "Cabinet")
                              :mod (c2 / country :wiki "South_Africa"
                                    :name (n3 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Africa")))
                        :op2 (g / government-organization :wiki -
                              :name (n4 / name :op1 "National" :op2 "Executive" :op3 "Council")
                              :part-of (g2 / government-organization :wiki "National_Assembly_of_South_Africa"
                                    :name (n5 / name :op1 "African" :op2 "National" :op3 "Assembly"))))
                  :ARG1 a)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0186.5 ::date 2012-12-05T09:13:44 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt According to what well - informed sources revealed , the African National Assembly will stop the majority of military activities , including drafting and arming cadres .
# ::save-date Tue Dec 10, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0186_5.txt
(r / reveal-01
      :ARG0 (s2 / source
            :ARG1-of (i / inform-01
                  :manner (g2 / good)))
      :ARG1 (s3 / stop-01
            :ARG0 (g / government-organization :wiki "National_Assembly_of_South_Africa"
                  :name (n / name :op1 "African" :op2 "National" :op3 "Assembly"))
            :ARG1 (a2 / activity
                  :mod (m / military)
                  :quant (m2 / majority)
                  :ARG2-of (i2 / include-01
                        :ARG1 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (d / draft-00)
                              :op2 (a4 / arm-01
                                    :ARG1 (c / cadre)))))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0186.6 ::date 2012-12-05T09:20:40 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt This large breakthrough has smoothed the way for releasing prisoners of the State and allowing people exiled to foreign countries to return home .
# ::save-date Tue Dec 10, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0186_6.txt
(s / smooth-01
      :ARG0 (b / breakthrough-01
            :mod (l / large)
            :mod (t / this))
      :ARG1 (w / way
            :path-of (a / and
                  :op1 (r / release-01
                        :ARG1 (p / person
                              :ARG1-of (i / imprison-01
                                    :ARG0 (s2 / state))))
                  :op2 (a2 / allow-01
                        :ARG1 (r2 / return-01
                              :ARG1 (p3 / person
                                    :ARG1-of (e / exile-01
                                          :location (c / country
                                                :mod (f / foreign))))
                              :ARG4 (h / home))))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0188.1 ::date 2012-12-10T07:03:14 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Since the Gannan Old District started an experimental region for economic structure reform in 1988 , Jiangxi 's Ganzhou City has achieved very large improvements in infrastructures such as transportation , energy , telecommunications etc. , creating conditions for development of an outward economy .
# ::save-date Tue Dec 10, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0188_1.txt
(a / achieve-01
      :ARG0 (c / city :wiki "Ganzhou"
            :name (n / name :op1 "Ganzhou")
            :location (p / province :wiki "Jiangxi"
                  :name (n2 / name :op1 "Jiangxi")))
      :ARG1 (i / improve-01
            :ARG1 (i2 / infrastructure
                  :example (a2 / and
                        :op1 (t / transport-01)
                        :op2 (e / energy)
                        :op3 (t2 / telecommunication)
                        :op4 (e2 / et-cetera)))
            :mod (l / large
                  :degree (v / very))
            :ARG0-of (c3 / create-01
                  :ARG1 (c4 / condition
                        :purpose (d / develop-02
                              :ARG1 (e3 / economy
                                    :mod (o / outward))))))
      :time (s / since
            :op1 (s2 / start-01
                  :ARG0 (c5 / city-district :wiki -
                        :name (n3 / name :op1 "Old" :op2 "District")
                        :location (c6 / city :wiki "Gannan_Tibetan_Autonomous_Prefecture"
                              :name (n4 / name :op1 "Gannan")))
                  :ARG1 (r / region
                        :mod (e4 / experiment-01)
                        :purpose (r2 / reform-01
                              :ARG1 (s4 / structure
                                    :mod (e5 / economy))))
                  :time (d2 / date-entity :year 1988))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0195.1 ::date 2012-12-12T08:06:02 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Resolutely implementing the guidelines of self - dependence , fighting our way , and building country thriftily .
# ::save-date Thu Dec 19, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0195_1.txt
(i / implement-01
      :ARG1 (g / guideline
            :topic (a / and
                  :op1 (d / depend-01
                        :ARG0 w
                        :ARG1 w)
                  :op2 (f / fight-01
                        :manner (w / way
                              :poss (w2 / we)))
                  :op3 (b / build-01
                        :ARG1 (c / country)
                        :manner (t / thrift))))
      :manner (r / resolute))

# ::id nw.chtb_0195.2 ::date 2012-12-12T08:09:40 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Our country is a large developing socialist country , the standing point of economic construction must be placed on the foundation of our own strength .
# ::save-date Tue Dec 17, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0195_2.txt
(c / country
      :mod (l / large)
      :mod (s / socialist)
      :ARG1-of (d / develop-02)
      :ARG0-of (c3 / cause-01
            :ARG1 (o / obligate-01
                  :ARG2 (f / found-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / point
                              :ARG2-of (s2 / stand-01
                                    :ARG1 (c4 / construct-01
                                          :ARG1 (e / economy))))
                        :ARG2 (s3 / strength
                              :poss w))))
      :poss (w / we))

# ::id nw.chtb_0195.3 ::date 2012-12-13T12:15:51 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt -- Extracted from the gazette of the 13th Plenary Session of the 7th Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
# ::save-date Fri Jan 24, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0195_3.txt
(e2 / extract-01
      :ARG2 (g / gazette
            :poss (e / event :wiki -
                  :name (n / name :op1 "Plenary" :op2 "Session")
                  :poss (o3 / organization :wiki "Central_Committee_of_the_Communist_Party_of_China"
                        :name (n4 / name :op1 "Committee")
                        :part-of (p / political-party :wiki "Communist_Party_of_China"
                              :name (n2 / name :op1 "Chinese" :op2 "Communist" :op3 "Party"))
                        :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity :value 7))
                  :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 13))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0199.1 ::date 2012-12-13T12:27:02 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Thu Dec 19, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0199_1.txt

      :ARG1 (p / person :wiki "Li_Peng"
            :name (n / name :op1 "Peng" :op2 "Li")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (p2 / premier)))
      :ARG4 (c2 / country :wiki "Malaysia"
            :name (n2 / name :op1 "Malaysia"))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 1990 :month 12 :day 10
            :dayperiod (a2 / afternoon))
      :purpose (v / visit-01
            :ARG0 p
            :mod (o / official)
            :mod (f / friendly))
      :ARG2-of (i / invite-01
            :ARG0 (p3 / person :wiki "Mahathir_Mohamad"
                  :name (n3 / name :op1 "Mahathir")
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 c2
                        :ARG2 (m / minister
                              :mod (p4 / prime))))
            :ARG1 p))

                  :ARG0 p2
                  :ARG1 (b / blood))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0201.3 ::date 2012-12-13T13:29:02 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Taken by Zuowei Gu

# ::id nw.chtb_0203.1 ::date 2012-12-13T13:33:31 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The " Steel Eighth Company " of a certain unit in the Beijing military region has actively organized new soldiers to implement colorful cultural and recreational activities , making the soldiers feel the warmth of the military camp .
# ::save-date Mon Jan 13, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0203_1.txt
(o / organize-01
      :ARG0 (m3 / military :wiki -
            :name (n / name :op1 "Steel" :op2 "Eighth" :op3 "Company")
            :part-of (u / unit
                  :mod (c / certain)
                  :location (r / region
                        :mod (m / military)
                        :mod (c2 / city :wiki "Beijing"
                              :name (n2 / name :op1 "Beijing")))))
      :ARG1 (p / person
            :mod (n4 / new)
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (s / soldier)))
      :manner (a / active)
      :purpose (i2 / implement-01
            :ARG0 m3
            :ARG1 (a2 / activity
                  :mod (r2 / recreate-00)
                  :mod (c3 / culture)
                  :mod (c4 / colorful)))
      :ARG0-of (m4 / make-02
            :ARG1 (f / feel-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (w / warm-01
                        :ARG1 (c6 / camp
                              :mod (m2 / military))))))

                  :name (n / name :op1 "Ganglun" :op2 "Tan")

                        :ARG2 (c3 / commander)))
            :ARG2 (a / activity
                  :mod (r / recreate-00))
            :accompanier (p / person
                  :mod (n2 / new)
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG2 (s2 / soldier)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0204.1 ::date 2012-12-14T09:50:24 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Products of Carpet Factory of Suizhong County , Liaoning province , sell well in countries and regions such as the US , Japan , Belgium , etc. , and supply falls short of demand .
# ::save-date Thu Jan 2, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0204_1.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (s2 / sell-01
            :ARG1 (p / product
                  :poss (c5 / company :wiki "Lhasa_Carpet_Factory"
                        :name (n / name :op1 "Carpet" :op2 "Factory")
                        :location (c6 / county :wiki "Suizhong_County"
                              :name (n2 / name :op1 "Suizhong")
                              :location (p3 / province :wiki "Liaoning"
                                    :name (n3 / name :op1 "Liaoning")))))
            :manner (g / good)
            :location (a2 / and
                  :op1 (c7 / country
                        :example (a3 / and
                              :op1 (c8 / country :wiki "United_States"
                                    :name (n4 / name :op1 "US"))
                              :op2 (c9 / country :wiki "Japan"
                                    :name (n5 / name :op1 "Japan"))
                              :op3 (c / country :wiki "Belgium"
                                    :name (n6 / name :op1 "Belgium"))
                              :op4 (e / et-cetera)))
                  :op2 (r / region)))
      :op2 (f / fall-04
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :ARG1-of (s3 / supply-01))
            :ARG2 (s / short-41
                  :ARG1 t
                  :ARG2 (d / demand-01
                        :ARG1 t))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0204.2 ::date 2012-12-14T10:02:58 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The naturally colored carpets produced by this factory won the " Pegasus " high quality prize awarded by Liaoning Province last year .
# ::save-date Mon Dec 9, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0204_2.txt
(w / win-01
      :ARG0 (c / carpet
            :ARG1-of (c2 / color-01
                  :manner (n / natural))
            :ARG1-of (p / produce-01
                  :ARG0 (f / factory
                        :mod (t / this))))
      :ARG1 (p2 / prize :wiki -
            :name (n2 / name :op1 "Pegasus")
            :mod (q / quality
                  :degree (h2 / high))
            :ARG1-of (a / award-01
                  :ARG0 (p3 / province :wiki "Liaoning"
                        :name (n3 / name :op1 "Liaoning"))))
      :time (y / year
            :mod (l2 / last)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0205.1 ::date 2012-12-14T11:57:01 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Chinese young pathfinder Mingxia Fu wins the diving champion of the Women 's 10 - meter diving tower at the World Swimming Championships .
# ::save-date Fri Dec 20, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0205_1.txt
(w2 / win-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person :wiki "Fu_Mingxia"
            :name (n / name :op1 "Mingxia" :op2 "Fu")
            :mod (y / young)
            :mod (c / country :wiki "China"
                  :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))
            :ARG0-of (f / find-01
                  :ARG1 (p / path)))
      :ARG1 (c3 / champion
            :mod (d2 / dive-01)
            :mod (t / tower
                  :subevent-of (g / game :wiki "FINA_World_Aquatics_Championships"
                        :name (n4 / name :op1 "World" :op2 "Swimming" :op3 "Championships"))
                  :mod d2
                  :quant (d3 / distance-quantity :quant 10
                        :unit (m3 / meter))
                  :mod (w3 / woman))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0208.2 ::date 2012-12-14T12:16:55 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt On the invitation of President Yeltsin of Russia , President Kuchma of the Ukraine and President Mitterrand of France , President Zemin Jiang will leave Beijing tomorrow afternoon to begin official and state visits to the above countries which will last for 10 days .
# ::save-date Thu Jan 2, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0208_2.txt
(l / leave-01
      :ARG0 (p7 / person :wiki "Jiang_Zemin"
            :name (n7 / name :op1 "Zemin" :op2 "Jiang")
            :ARG0-of (h4 / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (p8 / president)))
      :ARG1 (c8 / city :wiki "Beijing"
            :name (n8 / name :op1 "Beijing"))
      :purpose (b2 / begin-01
            :ARG0 p7
            :ARG1 (v / visit-01
                  :ARG0 p7
                  :ARG1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 c7
                        :op2 c5
                        :op3 c6)
                  :mod (o / official)
                  :mod (s / state)
                  :ARG1-of (l2 / last-01
                        :ARG2 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 10
                              :unit (d / day)))
                  :ARG2-of (i / invite-01
                        :ARG0 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (p / person :wiki "Boris_Yeltsin"
                                    :name (n5 / name :op1 "Yeltsin")
                                    :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG1 (c7 / country :wiki "Russia"
                                                :name (n6 / name :op1 "Russia"))
                                          :ARG2 (p2 / president)))
                              :op2 (p3 / person :wiki "Leonid_Kuchma"
                                    :name (n / name :op1 "Kuchma")
                                    :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG1 (c5 / country :wiki "Ukraine"
                                                :name (n2 / name :op1 "Ukraine"))
                                          :ARG2 (p4 / president)))
                              :op3 (p5 / person :wiki "Franois_Mitterrand"
                                    :name (n3 / name :op1 "Mitterrand")
                                    :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG1 (c6 / country :wiki "France"
                                                :name (n4 / name :op1 "France"))
                                          :ARG2 (p6 / president))))
                        :ARG1 p7)))
      :time (a / afternoon
            :part-of (t2 / tomorrow)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0208.6 ::date 2012-12-14T12:54:38 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt In 1943 , he joined the student movement led by an underground party , then joined the Chinese Communist Party in April , 1946 , and graduated in 1947 from the department of Electric Engineering of Shanghai Jiaotong University .
# ::save-date Mon Jan 13, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0208_6.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (j / join-01
            :ARG0 (h / he)
            :ARG1 (m / movement
                  :ARG1-of (l / lead-02
                        :ARG0 (p2 / party
                              :mod (u2 / underground)))
                  :mod (p / person
                        :ARG0-of (s / study-01)))
            :time (d4 / date-entity :year 1943))
      :op2 (j2 / join-01
            :ARG0 h
            :ARG1 (p3 / political-party :wiki "Communist_Party_of_China"
                  :name (n / name :op1 "Chinese" :op2 "Communist" :op3 "Party"))
            :time (d5 / date-entity :year 1946 :month 4)
            :time (t / then))
      :op3 (g / graduate-01
            :ARG0 h
            :ARG1 (d6 / department
                  :mod (e2 / engineering
                        :mod (e3 / electricity))
                  :part-of (u4 / university :wiki "Shanghai_Jiao_Tong_University"
                        :name (n3 / name :op1 "Shanghai" :op2 "Jiaotong" :op3 "University")))
            :time (d7 / date-entity :year 1947)))

                              :name (n2 / name :op1 "Work" :op2 "Affairs" :op3 "Department"))))
            :op3 (h2 / head-01
                  :ARG1 (w2 / workshop))
            :op4 (s7 / secretary
                  :ARG2-of (h4 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (b / branch
                              :mod (p3 / party)
                              :part-of (f2 / factory))))
            :op5 (c5 / chief
                  :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1)
                  :mod (v2 / vice)
                  :ARG2-of (h5 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c3 / company :wiki -
                              :name (n3 / name :op1 "Shanghai" :op2 "Number" :op3 "One" :op4 "Yiming" :op5 "Food" :op6 "Factory"))))
            :op6 (c / chief
                  :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity :value 1)
                  :mod (v / vice)
                  :ARG2-of (h6 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c4 / company :wiki -
                              :name (n4 / name :op1 "Shanghai" :op2 "Soap" :op3 "Factory"))))
            :op7 (d2 / director
                  :ARG2-of (h7 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (o8 / organization :wiki -
                              :name (n5 / name :op1 "Electrical" :op2 "Profession" :op3 "Bureau")
                              :part-of (o9 / organization :wiki -
                                    :name (n6 / name :op1 "Shanghai" :op2 "Number" :op3 "Two" :op4 "Design" :op5 "Branch" :op6 "of" :op7 "First" :op8 "Machine" :op9 "Ministry")))))
            :manner (s / succeed-03))
      :time (a / after
            :op1 (l / liberate-01
                  :ARG1 (c2 / city :wiki "Shanghai"
                        :name (n / name :op1 "Shanghai")))))

      :purpose (t / train-01
            :ARG2 h)
      :time (d2 / date-entity :year 1955))

# ::id nw.chtb_0208.9 ::date 2012-12-14T13:22:14 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt After returning home in 1956 , he served as vice-director of the Dynamics Division , vice-chief dynamics engineer , and chief of the Dynamics Branch Factory of Changchun 's First Automotive Manufacturing Factory .
# ::save-date Fri Jan 3, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0208_9.txt

      :ARG0 (h / he)
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (d / director
                  :mod (v / vice)
                  :ARG2-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (o4 / organization :wiki -
                              :name (n / name :op1 "Dynamics" :op2 "Division"))))
            :op2 (e / engineer-01
                  :mod (d4 / dynamic)
                  :mod (c / chief
                        :mod (v2 / vice))
                  :ARG3-of (h4 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c3 / company :wiki -
                              :name (n2 / name :op1 "Dynamics" :op2 "Branch" :op3 "Factory")
                              :part-of (c5 / company :wiki -
                                    :name (n3 / name :op1 "First" :op2 "Automotive" :op3 "Manufacturing" :op4 "Factory")
                                    :poss (c4 / city :wiki "Changchun"
                                          :name (n4 / name :op1 "Changchun"))))))
            :op3 (c2 / chief
                  :ARG2-of (h5 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 c3)))
      :time (a2 / after
            :op1 (r / return-01
                  :ARG1 h
                  :ARG4 (h2 / home)
                  :time (d5 / date-entity :year 1956))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0208.10 ::date 2012-12-14T13:27:52 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :ARG1 (o6 / organization :wiki -
                              :name (n4 / name :op1 "Wuhan" :op2 "Hot" :op3 "Work" :op4 "Machinery" :op5 "Research" :op6 "Agency")
                              :part-of g))
                  :op3 (s4 / secretary
                        :ARG1-of (a2 / act-01)

                        :ARG2-of (h6 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 g2)))))

            :op1 (d2 / date-entity :year 1980))

# ::id nw.chtb_0210.3 ::date 2012-12-17T13:03:49 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (a / agree-01

                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91

                              :ARG2 (p / person :quant 266)))
                  :ARG2 (c3 / country :wiki "Haiti"
                        :name (n3 / name :op1 "Haiti"))
                  :purpose (j / join-01
                        :ARG0 t2
                        :ARG1 (f / force
                              :mod (m / multi-national)
                              :ARG1-of (t4 / total-01
                                    :ARG2 (p2 / person
                                          :quant (a3 / about :op1 10000))))))
            :time (a2 / already)
            :time (b / before
                  :op1 (t / this))
            :time (d2 / date-entity :day 30)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0210.4 ::date 2012-12-17T13:12:30 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                              :mod (g / general))))

                  :ARG1 (e2 / effort
                        :mod (p / peace)
                        :source o
                        :consist-of (t2 / try-01

                                    :ARG1 (g2 / government-organization
                                          :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01
                                                :ARG1 (c / country :wiki "Haiti"
                                                      :name (n3 / name :op1 "Haiti")))
                                          :mod (m2 / military))
                                    :ARG2 (s3 / step-04
                                          :ARG0 g2))))
                  :time (a2 / already)
                  :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (r2 / refuse-01
                              :ARG0 (p3 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (r3 / rule-03
                                          :ARG1 c)
                                    :mod m2)
                              :ARG1 (m4 / meet-03
                                    :ARG0 p3

                                          :mod (s4 / special)
                                          :poss p4)))))
            :time (d / date-entity :day 30))
      :mod (a / also))

                        :time-of i)

            :ARG1-of (s2 / same-41)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0211.3 ::date 2012-12-18T11:29:14 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt At the same time , Solana expressed that , the Spanish government was deeply concerned over Cuba 's " dire situation of illegal immigrants " and would like to make necessary efforts to facilitate talks between Havana and Washington to look for solutions .
# ::save-date Wed Jan 22, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0211_3.txt
(e / express-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person :wiki "Javier_Solana"
            :name (n / name :op1 "Solana"))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (c5 / concern-01
                  :ARG0 (s / situation
                        :mod (d2 / dire)
                        :poss (c7 / country :wiki "Cuba"
                              :name (n3 / name :op1 "Cuba"))
                        :topic (p3 / person
                              :ARG0-of (i / immigrate-01
                                    :manner (l3 / law :polarity -))))
                  :ARG1 (g2 / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 (c6 / country :wiki "Spain"
                                    :name (n2 / name :op1 "Spain"))))

                              :mod (s5 / smuggle-01

                              :mod (n8 / new))

                              :mod (p2 / policy)))

      :mod (a5 / also))

# ::save-date Fri Dec 20, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0216_5.txt
(d / design-01
      :ARG1 (s / spaceship :wiki "Progress_M-24"
            :name (n / name :op1 "Progress" :op2 "M-24")
            :mod (d3 / duty
                  :mod (h / heavy)))
      :ARG3 (p2 / possible
            :domain (p3 / perform-01
                  :ARG0 s
                  :ARG1 (d2 / dock-01
                        :ARG0 s
                        :ARG2 (s2 / station
                              :ARG0-of (o / orbit-01))
                        :manner (a / automate-01))
                  :manner (m / mode
                        :manner (o2 / operate-01
                              :mod (m2 / man-01 :polarity -))))))

                                    :ARG1 c)))

                        :ARG1 (a7 / and

                                          :mod (r3 / recover-01
                                                :ARG1 (e2 / economy
                                                      :poss c))))
                              :op2 (p3 / postpone-01
                                    :ARG1 p4))))))

                              :calendar (m / moon)))

                        :op1 (e / eye
                              :part-of (y / you))))

      :time (e / early
            :degree (m / more)
            :quant (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                  :unit (y / year))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0227.6 ::date 2012-11-02T09:18:45 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :part-of y))
      :op2 (c7 / complete-01

                        :ARG2 (c8 / country :wiki "Estonia"
                              :name (n3 / name :op1 "Estonia"))))

                  :ARG1 t2
                  :ARG2 c8)

                  :part-of (y / year
                        :mod (t4 / this)))
            :mod (a2 / also)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0231.6 ::date 2012-11-05T13:54:03 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri Jan 3, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0231_6.txt
(h / have-concession-91
      :ARG1 (r / reiterate-01
            :ARG0 (m2 / military :wiki "Irish_Republican_Army"
                  :name (n / name :op1 "Irish" :op2 "Republican" :op3 "Army"))
            :ARG1 (a2 / adhere-02
                  :ARG0 m2
                  :ARG1 (o3 / objective
                        :mod (r2 / republican)
                        :poss m2
                        :ARG0-of (m / mean-01
                              :ARG1 (u / unify-01
                                    :ARG1 (i3 / island :wiki "Ireland"
                                          :name (n2 / name :op1 "Ireland")
                                          :mod (e / entire)))))
                  :mod (s / still))
            :mod (a / also)))

            :op2 (s / scholar)

            :mod (b / bone
                  :part-of (d2 / dinosaur)))
      :time (r2 / recent)
      :location (c / city :wiki -
            :name (n / name :op1 "Yangcheng" :op2 "Township")
            :location (c2 / county :wiki "Xixia_County"
                  :name (n2 / name :op1 "Xixia" :op2 "County")
                  :location (p / province :wiki "Henan"
                        :name (n3 / name :op1 "Henan" :op2 "Province")))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0232.4 ::date 2012-11-07T14:14:02 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :ARG1 (a / and

                              :op3 (e2 / et-cetera)))
                  :mod (b / bone
                        :part-of (d2 / dinosaur)))
            :time (b3 / begin-01
                  :ARG1 (d3 / date-entity :month 4
                        :mod (y / year
                              :mod (t2 / this))))
            :location (p4 / place
                  :example (a2 / and
                        :op1 (l4 / location :wiki -
                              :name (n / name :op1 "Hutou" :op2 "Hill"))
                        :op2 (c / city :wiki -
                              :name (n2 / name :op1 "Yangcheng" :op2 "Township")
                              :location (c2 / county :wiki "Xixia_County"
                                    :name (n3 / name :op1 "Xixia")))
                        :op3 (e3 / et-cetera)))
            :location (b2 / between
                  :op1 (l3 / layer :quant 2
                        :mod (g / gravel
                              :mod (r4 / river)))))
      :ARG2 (r5 / research-institute :wiki -
            :name (n4 / name :op1 "Archaeological" :op2 "Institute" :op3 "of" :op4 "Cultural" :op5 "Relics")))

# ::id nw.chtb_0232.8 ::date 2012-11-07T15:36:26 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                              :name (n / name :op1 "Xixia" :op2 "Basin")))
                  :mod (i2 / international))
            :op2 (r / rare
                  :degree (m / more)
                  :domain (b2 / be-located-at-91
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (f2 / fossil
                                    :mod (e3 / egg))
                              :op2 (f3 / fossil
                                    :mod (b3 / bone)))
                        :ARG2 (p / place
                              :mod (o / one)))
                  :mod (e4 / even))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0232.9 ::date 2012-11-07T15:57:25 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :ARG1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (z / zoology
                              :mod d)
                        :op2 (h / habit
                              :mod (b2 / breed-01))))
            :op3 (r / restore-01
                  :ARG1 (a4 / and
                        :op1 (z2 / zoology
                              :time (e / era
                                    :mod (d4 / dinosaur)))
                        :op2 (e2 / ecology
                              :time e)))
            :op4 (r2 / reveal-01
                  :ARG1 (l4 / law
                        :topic (a5 / and
                              :op1 (c2 / change-01
                                    :ARG1 (s3 / surface
                                          :poss (e3 / earth)))
                              :op2 (e4 / evolve-01
                                    :ARG1 (e5 / environment
                                          :poss e3))))))
      :mod (i2 / important)
      :mod (g2 / great))

# ::id nw.chtb_0234.3 ::date 2012-11-07T17:02:32 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (a2 / and

                  :ARG0 (d / draft-01

                              :name (n / name :op1 "Arbitration" :op2 "Law")))

                        :ARG1 (d2 / dispute-01
                              :ARG2 (e / economy))
                        :manner (a4 / and
                              :op1 (j / just)
                              :op2 (t / timely))))
            :op2 (p / protect-01
                  :ARG0 d
                  :ARG1 (r2 / right
                        :mod (l3 / law)
                        :poss (p2 / party
                              :ARG1-of (i / involve-01))))
            :op3 (e2 / ensure-01
                  :ARG1 (d3 / develop-02
                        :ARG0 d
                        :ARG1 (e3 / economy
                              :mod (m / market)
                              :mod (s2 / socialist))
                        :manner (h / health))
                  :ARG2-of (r3 / result-01
                        :ARG1 (a5 / and
                              :op1 g
                              :op2 p)))))

                  :location (a2 / area
                        :example (a3 / and

                                    :op1 (o / organization)
                                    :op2 (i3 / institution)
                                    :ARG0-of (a5 / arbitrate-01))
                              :op2 (a6 / and
                                    :op1 (d / draft-01

                                          :ARG1 a7))

                                    :mod a5)

                                          :ARG1 (f / foreigner)))
                              :op5 (e2 / et-cetera))))
            :manner (c4 / clear)))

            :mod (a / also)))

                              :unit (y2 / year))))))

                                    :degree (h / high))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0241.4 ::date 2012-11-08T19:18:48 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                                          :ARG1-of (n2 / need-01)))))))

                  :ARG2 (t3 / top))

                  :ARG2 (c2 / compete-01

                              :mod (i / international))))
            :quant (n3 / number))

            :ARG1 l2

                        :mod (b2 / basic))

                        :ARG2 (r / represent-01
                              :ARG0 t4

# ::id nw.chtb_0241.5 ::date 2012-11-08T20:07:13 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt After many years ' of construction , key national laboratories have established a number of experimental research bases for basic research , involving not only the basic research fields and emerging sciences and technologies fields , but also in engineering projects closely related to national economic development .
# ::save-date Fri Jan 3, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0241_5.txt

      :ARG0 (l / laboratory
            :mod (k / key)
            :mod (n / nation))
      :ARG1 (b / base
            :mod (r / research-01
                  :manner (e2 / experiment-01))

                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (f / field
                              :mod r2)
                        :op2 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (f2 / field
                                    :ARG0-of (e3 / emerge-02)
                                    :mod (s / science))
                              :op2 (f3 / field
                                    :ARG0-of e3
                                    :mod (t / technology)))
                        :op3 (p / project
                              :mod (e4 / engineer-01)
                              :ARG1-of (r3 / relate-01
                                    :ARG2 (d / develop-02
                                          :ARG1 (n3 / nation)
                                          :mod (e5 / economy))
                                    :mod (a4 / also)
                                    :manner (c2 / close)))))
            :quant (n2 / number))
      :ARG3 (r2 / research-01
            :mod (b2 / basic))
      :time (a / after
            :op1 (m / many
                  :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                        :unit (y2 / year))
                  :duration-of (c / construct-01))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0241.6 ::date 2012-11-09T09:06:20 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt For instance , key national laboratories in such areas as surface physics , superconductors , molecular biology , biotechnology , information systems , intelligence technology , geochemistry , materials science , etc. , have actually become important experimental research centers of China in these fields .
# ::save-date Thu Dec 12, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0241_6.txt

      :ARG0 (b / become-01

                  :mod (k / key)

                                    :mod (s / surface))

                                    :mod (m / molecule))
                              :op4 (b3 / biotechnology)
                              :op5 (s3 / system
                                    :mod (i2 / information))
                              :op6 (t / technology
                                    :mod (i3 / intelligence))
                              :op7 (g / geochemistry)
                              :op8 (s4 / science
                                    :mod (m2 / material)))))
            :ARG2 (c3 / center
                  :purpose (r / research-01
                        :manner (e / experiment-01))
                  :poss (c4 / country :wiki "China"
                        :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))
                  :mod (i / important)
                  :location a3)
            :mod (a / actual)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0241.7 ::date 2012-11-09T09:44:46 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt In the past 10 years , key national laboratories , in various ways , have also taken on a large quantity of national natural science fund projects , national climbing program projects , national science and technology brainstorming projects , " 863 " program projects , institutional co-operation projects , society entrusted projects , etc. , and have solved a series of significant problems of science and technology in national economic construction .
# ::save-date Fri Jan 3, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0241_7.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (t / take-09
            :ARG0 (l / laboratory
                  :mod (k / key)
                  :mod (n / nation))
            :ARG1 (a5 / and
                  :op1 (p / project
                        :topic (f / fund
                              :mod (s / science
                                    :mod (n3 / natural)))
                        :mod (n2 / nation))
                  :op2 (p4 / project
                        :topic (p2 / program
                              :mod (c / climb-01))
                        :mod n2)
                  :op3 (p6 / project
                        :topic (b / brainstorm)
                        :mod (s2 / science)
                        :mod n4)
                  :op4 (p7 / project
                        :topic (b3 / brainstorm-00)
                        :mod (t2 / technology)
                        :mod n4)
                  :op5 (p8 / project
                        :topic (p3 / program :wiki "863_Program"
                              :name (n4 / name :op1 863)))
                  :op6 (p9 / project
                        :topic (c2 / cooperate-01
                              :ARG0 (i / institution)))
                  :op7 (p10 / project
                        :ARG1-of (e / entrust-01
                              :ARG2 (s3 / society)))
                  :op8 (e3 / et-cetera)
                  :quant (q / quantity
                        :mod (l2 / large)))
            :manner (v / various)
            :mod (a4 / also)
            :duration (b2 / before
                  :op1 (n5 / now)
                  :duration (t3 / temporal-quantity :quant 10
                        :unit (y / year))))
      :op2 (s4 / solve-01
            :ARG0 l
            :ARG1 (p5 / problem
                  :mod (s5 / significant)
                  :quant (s6 / series)
                  :topic (a2 / and
                        :op1 (s7 / science)
                        :op2 (t4 / technology))
                  :prep-in (c3 / construct-01
                        :ARG1 (e2 / economy
                              :mod n2)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0241.8 ::date 2012-11-09T10:27:35 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                              :mod (c5 / comprehensive)
                              :mod (v / various)))))

            :ARG1 (d / discipline
                  :ARG1-of (r / relevant-41))
            :location (c3 / country :wiki "China"
                  :name (n / name :op1 "China")))
      :time (a / after
            :op1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (e2 / establish-01
                        :ARG1 (l2 / laboratory
                              :mod (k / key)
                              :mod (n2 / nation)))
                  :op2 (c4 / construct-01
                        :ARG1 l2)))
      :degree (g / great))

# ::id nw.chtb_0241.9 ::date 2012-11-09T10:51:24 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :ARG0 b
                  :ARG1 (t2 / theory
                        :topic s))
            :op2 (p2 / perfect-01
                  :ARG0 b
                  :ARG1 t2)))

      :ARG0 (p / person :wiki "Boris_Yeltsin"
            :name (n / name :op1 "Yeltsin")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c4 / country :wiki "Russia"
                        :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russia"))
                  :ARG2 (p2 / president)))
      :ARG1 (s2 / strike-01 :polarity -
            :ARG0 w3
            :ARG1 (p3 / position
                  :poss (c5 / country :wiki "Serbia"
                        :name (n3 / name :op1 "Serbia"))
                  :location (c6 / country :wiki "Bosnia_and_Herzegovina"
                        :name (n4 / name :op1 "Bosnia" :op2 "Herzegovina")))
            :path (a / air))
      :ARG2 (w3 / world-region :wiki "Western_world"
            :name (n5 / name :op1 "West"))
      :medium (i / interview-01
            :ARG0 (p4 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (m / magazine :wiki "Zerkalo_Nedeli"
                              :name (n6 / name :op1 "Mirror" :op2 "Weekly")
                              :mod (c8 / country :wiki "Germany"
                                    :name (n7 / name :op1 "Germany")))
                        :ARG3 (r2 / report-01)))
            :ARG1 p))

                                    :name (n3 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations"))

                                    :ARG1 (p4 / peace)))
                        :degree (m2 / more)))

                  :ARG0 (t2 / troop
                        :mod c2

                              :ARG1 (f / force
                                    :poss o3

                                    :name (n4 / name :op1 "Balkan"))))
                  :ARG1 (w2 / welcome-01
                        :ARG1 t2)))
      :medium (s2 / speech
            :poss p2))

# ::id nw.chtb_0247.8 ::date 2012-11-11T11:26:28 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Lilan Zhu , vice-chairman of National Science and Technology Committee , said today at the fair 's opening ceremony that with China 's economic prosperity and rapid technological progress , people 's living standard continuously improving and purchasing capability continuously strengthening , China 's book import market has great potential .
# ::save-date Wed Dec 18, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0247_8.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person :wiki -
            :name (n2 / name :op1 "Lilan" :op2 "Zhu")
            :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (o2 / organization :wiki -
                        :name (n3 / name :op1 "National" :op2 "Science" :op3 "and" :op4 "Technology" :op5 "Committee"))
                  :ARG2 (c / chairman
                        :mod (v2 / vice))))
      :ARG1 (h / have-03
            :ARG0 (m / market
                  :mod (i / import-01
                        :ARG1 (b / book))
                  :poss (c5 / country :wiki "China"
                        :name (n4 / name :op1 "China")))
            :ARG1 (p3 / potential
                  :mod (g / great))
            :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (a / and
                        :op1 (p4 / prosper-01
                              :ARG0 c5
                              :mod (e / economy))
                        :op2 (p5 / progress-01
                              :ARG1 c5
                              :mod (t2 / technology)
                              :manner (r / rapid))
                        :op3 (i2 / improve-01
                              :ARG1 (s2 / standard
                                    :mod (l2 / live-01)
                                    :poss (p6 / person))
                              :ARG1-of (c3 / continue-01))
                        :op4 (s3 / strengthen-01
                              :ARG1 (c7 / capable-41
                                    :ARG1 p6
                                    :ARG2 (p7 / purchase-01
                                          :ARG0 p6))
                              :manner c3))))
      :time (t / today)

            :mod (o3 / open-01
                  :ARG1 (f / fair))))

      :ARG0 (s2 / spokesperson
            :mod (t / this))

                  :ARG0-of (r2 / report-01)))

                              :mod c4))

# ::save-date Fri Dec 13, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0256_4.txt
(e / express-01
      :ARG0 (w / we)
      :ARG1 (c / condolence
            :poss w
            :mod (d / deep
                  :degree (m / most))
            :topic (d2 / die-01
                  :ARG1 (h / he))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0256.5 ::date 2012-11-12T13:19:15 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Key national leaders of China have already sent telegrams of condolences .
# ::save-date Fri Jan 3, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0256_5.txt
(s / send-01
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (l / lead-02
                  :ARG1 (c3 / country :wiki "China"
                        :name (n / name :op1 "China")))
            :mod (k / key)
            :mod (n2 / nation))
      :ARG1 (t / telegram
            :mod (c4 / condolence))
      :time (a / already))

# ::id nw.chtb_0260.2 ::date 2012-11-12T13:35:56 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt China 's People 's Congress delegation led by vice-chief committee member Jiyun Tian ended a 6 - day visit to New Zealand , and left here this evening for the capitol of West Samoa , Apia .
# ::save-date Thu Apr 17, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0260_2.txt
(a2 / and
      :op1 (e / end-01
            :ARG0 (d2 / delegation
                  :poss (g3 / government-organization :wiki "National_People's_Congress"
                        :name (n2 / name :op1 "People's" :op2 "Congress")
                        :mod (c4 / country :wiki "China"
                              :name (n3 / name :op1 "China")))
                  :ARG1-of (l / lead-02
                        :ARG0 (p / person :wiki "Tian_Jiyun"
                              :name (n4 / name :op1 "Jiyun" :op2 "Tian")
                              :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (c5 / committee)
                                    :ARG2 (m / member))
                              :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 c5
                                    :ARG2 (c / chief
                                          :mod (v3 / vice))))))
            :ARG1 (v2 / visit-01
                  :ARG0 d2
                  :ARG1 (c6 / country :wiki "New_Zealand"
                        :name (n5 / name :op1 "New" :op2 "Zealand"))
                  :duration (t / temporal-quantity :quant 6
                        :unit (d / day))))
      :op2 (l2 / leave-04
            :ARG0 d2
            :ARG1 c6
            :ARG2 (c2 / city :wiki "Apia"
                  :name (n6 / name :op1 "Apia")
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c8 / country :wiki "Samoa"
                              :name (n7 / name :op1 "West" :op2 "Samoa"))
                        :ARG2 (c3 / capital)))
            :time (e2 / evening
                  :mod (t2 / this))))

                                    :name (n5 / name :op1 "New" :op2 "Zealand")))
                        :ARG2 (m2 / minister
                              :mod (p2 / prime))
                        :ARG3 (s2 / speak-01)))
            :op2 (p3 / person
                  :mod (o3 / other)
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                              :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01))
                        :ARG2 (o / official
                              :mod (s / senior)))))
      :time (b / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 p4
            :ARG2 c2)
      :mod (r / respective))

                              :mod c5))
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-rel-role-91
                        :ARG1 h
                        :ARG2 (f / friend)))
            :op2 (p / person
                  :mod (c / country :wiki "China" :name (n3 / name :op1 "China")))
            :op3 (p2 / person
                  :location (o / overseas)
                  :mod c))
      :mod (b / broad)
      :mod (a3 / also))

# ::id nw.chtb_0260.5 ::date 2012-11-13T18:34:19 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (p / party
            :quant (b / both))
      :ARG1 (d / desire-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (s / strengthen-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (c / cooperate-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG2 (a / area
                              :mod (e2 / economy)))
                  :mod (f / further))))

            :op2 (c8 / country :wiki "Australia"
                  :name (n4 / name :op1 "Australia")))
      :mod (a3 / also)
      :prep-in-addition-to (c9 / country :wiki "Samoa"
            :name (n5 / name :op1 "West" :op2 "Samoa")))

# ::id nw.chtb_0262.2 ::date 2012-11-13T19:10:08 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

            :name (n2 / name :op1 "Yuyi" :op2 "Liu")

            :poss-of (c2 / canvas :wiki -
                  :name (n3 / name :op1 "A" :op2 "Happy" :op3 "Night")
                  :ARG0-of (c3 / cause-01
                        :ARG1 (s / sensation)
                        :location (w / world
                              :mod (a / art)))
                  :mod (f / famous))
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (p2 / professor)))
      :ARG1 (s3 / stone :wiki -
            :name (n5 / name :op1 "The" :op2 "Stone" :op3 "of" :op4 "the" :op5 "Divine" :op6 "Land" :op7 "with" :op8 "Five" :op9 "Unique" :op10 "Features")
            :mod (y2 / yuhua)
            :ARG1-of (d / discover-01
                  :ARG0 p))
      :time (r / recent)
      :location (c4 / city :wiki "Nanjing"
            :name (n4 / name :op1 "Nanjing")))

# ::id nw.chtb_0262.3 ::date 2012-11-13T19:24:24 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The appearance and size of this yuhua stone is quite similar to an auspicious folk object , a longevity locket .
# ::save-date Wed Dec 18, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0262_3.txt
(r / resemble-01
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (a2 / appearance
                  :poss (s2 / stone
                        :mod (y / yuhua)
                        :mod (t / this)))
            :op2 (s / size
                  :poss s2))
      :ARG2 (o / object
            :mod (f / folk)
            :mod (a3 / auspicious)
            :mod (l / locket
                  :purpose (l2 / longevity)))
      :degree (q / quite))

# ::id nw.chtb_0262.4 ::date 2012-11-13T19:32:21 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
