      :ARG1 (i / image
            :topic (t / territory
                  :mod (c / country :wiki "China"
                        :name (n / name :op1 "People's" :op2 "Republic" :op3 "of" :op4 "China")))
            :mod (c2 / clear))
      :ARG2 (m / middle
            :part-of (s / stone
                  :mod (y / yuhua))
            :mod (v / very)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0262.5 ::date 2012-11-13T19:43:00 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The image , with its two ends towering , a sunken middle section , and the lower right part protruding , looks like a rooster craning and crowing with its neck stretched and chest thrown out ; on the side of the " rooster 's " belly is the long and narrow " Taiwan Island " , which is separated by " straits " ; under the claw of the " rooster " is the round " Hainan Island " .
# ::save-date Mon May 12, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0262_5.txt
(m3 / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (l3 / look-02
            :ARG0 (i / image
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-03
                        :ARG1 (a / and
                              :op1 (e / end
                                    :ARG0-of (t2 / tower-01)
                                    :quant (t3 / two)
                                    :part-of i)
                              :op2 (s / section
                                    :ARG1-of (s2 / sink-01)
                                    :location (m / middle))
                              :op3 (p / part
                                    :ARG1-of (p2 / protrude-01)
                                    :location (r2 / right
                                          :location (l / low
                                                :degree (m2 / more)))))))
            :ARG1 (r3 / rooster
                  :ARG0-of (c / crane-01
                        :manner (a2 / and
                              :op1 (s3 / stretch-01
                                    :ARG1 (n / neck
                                          :part-of r3))
                              :op2 (t4 / throw-01
                                    :ARG0 (c3 / chest
                                          :part-of r3)
                                    :ARG2 (o / out))))
                  :ARG0-of (c2 / crow-01
                        :manner a2)))
      :snt2 (b2 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (i2 / island :wiki "Taiwan"
                  :name (n2 / name :op1 "Taiwan" :op2 "Island")
                  :ARG1-of (s5 / separate-01
                        :ARG0 (s6 / strait))
                  :mod (l2 / long)
                  :mod (n4 / narrow))
            :ARG2 (s4 / side
                  :part-of (b / belly
                        :part-of (r5 / rooster))))
      :snt3 (b3 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (i3 / island :wiki "Hainan"
                  :name (n3 / name :op1 "Hainan" :op2 "Island")
                  :mod (r4 / round))
            :ARG2 (u / under
                  :op1 (c4 / claw
                        :part-of (r6 / rooster)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0262.6 ::date 2012-11-14T07:28:26 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

            :op1 (c3 / color
                  :poss (i / island :quant 2))
            :op2 (l / luster
                  :poss i))
      :ARG2 (m / mainland)
      :degree (c2 / complete))

                  :name (n / name :op1 "China")))

# ::id nw.chtb_0262.8 ::date 2012-11-14T07:41:15 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Professor Yuyi Liu said that he picked up the stone on the road to a yuhua stone processing plant in a suburb of Nanjing five years ago , and after he returned home he carefully inspected the stone and discovered the " territory of China " on it .
# ::save-date Thu Jan 23, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0262_8.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :wiki -
            :name (n2 / name :op1 "Yuyi" :op2 "Liu")
            :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (p2 / professor)))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (p3 / pick-04
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (s2 / stone)
                  :location (r / road
                        :destination (p4 / plant
                              :ARG0-of (p5 / process-01
                                    :ARG1 (s3 / stone
                                          :mod (y2 / yuhua)))
                              :location (s4 / suburb
                                    :part-of (c4 / city :wiki "Nanjing"
                                          :name (n3 / name :op1 "Nanjing")))))
                  :time (b / before
                        :op1 (n / now)
                        :quant (t / temporal-quantity :quant 5
                              :unit (y3 / year))))
            :op2 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (i / inspect-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 s2
                        :manner (c5 / careful)
                        :time (a3 / after
                              :op1 (r2 / return-01
                                    :ARG1 p
                                    :ARG4 (h / home))))
                  :op2 (d / discover-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 (t2 / territory
                              :mod (c6 / country :wiki "China"
                                    :name (n4 / name :op1 "China"))
                              :location s2)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0262.9 ::date 2012-11-14T08:08:29 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt At the same time he also discovered that entrenched above the mainland territory and along the frontier lines of the northeast , the north , and the northwest of China is a huge dragon with a bright pearl in its mouth ; above this huge dragon , there is a golden facula in the shape of a gold dollar ; in the middle of the mainland territory , there is a string of torch - shaped stripes symbolizing the eternal flame of life of the Chinese nation ; adding in its resemblance to a longevity locket , altogether this stone has 5 special features .
# ::save-date Sun Dec 15, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0262_9.txt
(m4 / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (d / discover-01
            :ARG0 (h / he)
            :ARG1 (e / entrench-01
                  :ARG1 (d2 / dragon
                        :mod (h2 / huge)
                        :ARG0-of (h4 / have-03
                              :ARG1 (p / pearl
                                    :mod (b / bright)
                                    :location (m2 / mouth
                                          :part-of d2))))
                  :ARG2 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (a3 / above
                              :op1 (t / territory
                                    :mod (m / mainland)))
                        :op2 (a4 / along
                              :op1 (a9 / and
                                    :op1 (l5 / line
                                          :mod (f / frontier)
                                          :mod (n2 / northeast
                                                :part-of (c3 / country :wiki "China"
                                                      :name (n / name :op1 "China"))))
                                    :op2 (l6 / line
                                          :mod f
                                          :mod (n3 / north
                                                :part-of c3))
                                    :op3 (l7 / line
                                          :mod f
                                          :mod (n4 / northwest
                                                :part-of c3))))))
            :time (t3 / time
                  :ARG1-of (s / same-41))
            :mod (a5 / also))
      :snt2 (b2 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (f2 / facula
                  :mod (g / gold)
                  :ARG1-of (s2 / shape-01
                        :ARG2 (d3 / dollar
                              :consist-of (g2 / gold))))
            :ARG2 (a6 / above
                  :op1 (d4 / dragon
                        :mod (h5 / huge)
                        :mod (t4 / this))))
      :snt3 (b3 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (s4 / stripe
                  :ARG1-of (s6 / symbolize-01
                        :ARG2 (f3 / flame
                              :mod (l / life)
                              :poss (n5 / nation
                                    :mod (c / country :wiki "China"
                                          :name (n6 / name :op1 "China")))
                              :duration (e3 / eternal)))
                  :quant (s9 / string)
                  :ARG1-of (s3 / shape-01
                        :ARG2 (t2 / torch)))
            :ARG2 (m3 / middle
                  :part-of (t5 / territory
                        :mod (m5 / mainland))))
      :snt4 (h3 / have-03
            :ARG0 (s7 / stone
                  :mod (t6 / this))
            :ARG1 (f5 / feature :quant 5
                  :mod (s8 / special))
            :mod (a7 / altogether)
            :condition (a8 / add-02
                  :ARG1 (r / resemble-01
                        :ARG1 s7
                        :ARG2 (l3 / locket
                              :purpose (l4 / longevity))))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0263.2 ::date 2012-11-14T09:38:04 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Six countries , namely China , Thailand , Vietnam , Burma , Laos and Cambodia , will further strengthen co-operation in such areas as transportation , energy , trade and investment , environmental protection , tourism and human resources development , etc .
# ::save-date Sun Dec 15, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0263_2.txt

      :ARG0 (c10 / country :quant 6
            :ARG0-of (m / mean-01
                  :ARG1 (a5 / and
                        :op1 (c11 / country :wiki "China"
                              :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))
                        :op2 (c12 / country :wiki "Thailand"
                              :name (n3 / name :op1 "Thailand"))
                        :op3 (c13 / country :wiki "Vietnam"
                              :name (n4 / name :op1 "Vietnam"))
                        :op4 (c14 / country :wiki "Burma"
                              :name (n5 / name :op1 "Burma"))
                        :op5 (c15 / country :wiki "Laos"
                              :name (n6 / name :op1 "Laos"))
                        :op6 (c16 / country :wiki "Cambodia"
                              :name (n7 / name :op1 "Cambodia")))))
      :ARG1 (c9 / cooperate-01
            :ARG0 a5
            :ARG2 (a / area
                  :example (a4 / and
                        :op1 (t2 / transport-01)
                        :op2 (e / energy)
                        :op3 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (t3 / trade-01)
                              :op2 (i / invest-01))
                        :op4 (p / protect-01
                              :ARG1 (e2 / environment))
                        :op5 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (t4 / tourism)
                              :op2 (d / develop-02
                                    :ARG1 (r / resource
                                          :mod (h / human))))
                        :op6 (e3 / et-cetera))))
      :mod (f / further))

# ::id nw.chtb_0263.3 ::date 2012-11-14T09:48:18 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt This was the common understanding held by representatives of the six aforementioned countries at the Asian Development Bank 's third secondary region economic co-operation meeting , which closed today .
# ::save-date Mon Jan 13, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0263_3.txt
(u / understand-01
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (r / represent-01
                  :ARG1 (c / country :quant 6
                        :ARG1-of (m2 / mention-01
                              :time (a / afore)))))
      :ARG1 (t3 / this)
      :ARG1-of (s2 / share-01)
      :time (m / meet-03
            :ARG0 (o2 / organization :wiki "Asian_Development_Bank"
                  :name (n / name :op1 "Asian" :op2 "Development" :op3 "Bank"))
            :mod (r2 / region
                  :mod (s / secondary))
            :ARG1-of (c2 / close-03
                  :time (t / today))
            :purpose (c3 / cooperate-01
                  :ARG2 (e / economy))
            :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 3)))

            :mod (t / this))

            :domain (t2 / transport-01)

                        :destination c6)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0266.4 ::date 2012-11-15T12:42:00 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                              :name (n / name :op1 "Palestine"))))

                                          :op1 (a3 / aid-01

# ::id nw.chtb_0266.6 ::date 2012-11-15T13:22:19 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Shawel said that although the US and the World Bank are currently not completely satisfied with Palestinian accounting work , they have still agreed to pay a portion of the funds as soon as possible .
# ::save-date Wed Dec 18, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0266_6.txt
(s2 / say-01
      :ARG0 (p3 / person :wiki -
            :name (n / name :op1 "Shawel"))
      :ARG1 (a / agree-01
            :ARG0 a2
            :ARG1 (p4 / pay-01
                  :ARG0 a2
                  :ARG1 (p / portion
                        :part-of (m / monetary-quantity
                              :ARG2-of (f / fund-01)))
                  :time (s3 / soon
                        :degree (p6 / possible)))
            :mod (s4 / still))
      :concession (s / satisfy-01 :polarity -
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (c3 / country :wiki "United_States"
                        :name (n2 / name :op1 "US"))
                  :op2 (o / organization :wiki "World_Bank"
                        :name (n3 / name :op1 "World" :op2 "Bank")))
            :ARG2 (w2 / work-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (a3 / account-01
                        :ARG0 (c / country :wiki "State_of_Palestine"
                              :name (n4 / name :op1 "Palestine"))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0272.2 ::date 2012-11-15T15:50:17 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

            :name (n / name :op1 "China"))

      :purpose (s3 / strengthen-01
            :ARG0 c5

                        :ARG0 p

                  :op2 (c9 / contact-01

                                    :source (e4 / emperor))

                                    :op1 (h2 / home)
                                    :op2 (a4 / abroad))))))

            :op1 (d2 / date-entity :day 8 :month 12)
            :op2 (d3 / date-entity :month 12 :day 18)
            :mod (y / year
                  :mod (t3 / this))))

      :mod (m / main))

                        :ARG2 (c / chairman)))

                        :ARG2 (p4 / premier))))
      :ARG0-of (c5 / create-01
            :ARG1 (p5 / phase
                  :mod (n / new)
                  :part-of r)))

                                    :name (n4 / name :op1 "America"))))
                  :ARG1 p2))

                  :op1 (m3 / maintain-01
                        :ARG1 r)
                  :op2 (d / develop-02
                        :ARG1 r))
            :mod (i / important))
      :time (a3 / after
            :mod (r2 / resign-01
                  :ARG0 n2)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0273.8 ::date 2012-11-16T09:59:52 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt We deeply believe that with the mutual effort of both China and the US , the Sino - American relations which Mr. Nixon was very concerned with during his lifetime will definitely see further improvement and development .
# ::save-date Wed Dec 18, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0273_8.txt
(b / believe-01
      :ARG0 (w / we)
      :ARG1 (s2 / see-01
            :ARG0 (r / relation
                  :ARG0-of (c6 / concern-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person :wiki "Richard_Nixon"
                              :name (n4 / name :op1 "Mr." :op2 "Nixon"))
                        :duration (l / live-01
                              :ARG0 p2)
                        :degree (v / very))
                  :mod (b2 / between
                        :op1 (c4 / country :wiki "China"
                              :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))
                        :op2 (c5 / country :wiki "United_States"
                              :name (n3 / name :op1 "America"))))
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (i / improve-01
                        :ARG1 r)
                  :op2 (d3 / develop-02
                        :ARG1 r)
                  :degree (f2 / further))
            :mod (d2 / definite))
      :manner (d / deep)
      :condition (e / effort
            :mod (m2 / mutual)
            :poss (a / and
                  :op1 c4
                  :op2 c5)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0273.9 ::date 2012-11-16T10:21:01 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (a2 / and
            :op1 (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 (c6 / country :wiki "China"
                              :name (n3 / name :op1 "China"))))
            :op2 (g2 / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g4 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 (c7 / country :wiki "Australia"
                              :name (n4 / name :op1 "Australia")))))
      :ARG1 (a3 / agree-01
            :ARG1 (l / loan-01
                  :ARG0 (p / party
                        :mod c7)
                  :ARG1 (m2 / monetary-quantity :quant 150000000
                        :unit (d2 / dollar
                              :mod c7))
                  :ARG2 c6
                  :mod (p3 / prefer-01)
                  :mod (f / finance)))
      :time (t / today))

# ::id nw.chtb_0277.3 ::date 2012-11-16T10:54:24 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (u / use-01
            :ARG1 (m3 / monetary-quantity
                  :ARG1-of (l / loan-01)
                  :mod (t3 / this))
            :ARG2 (p / project
                  :mod (i / infrastructure)
                  :example (a2 / and
                        :op1 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (t / telecommunication)
                              :op2 (s3 / supply-01
                                    :ARG1 (w / water)
                                    :mod (m2 / municipal))
                              :op3 (t2 / treat-04
                                    :ARG1 (s4 / sewage))
                              :op4 (e / et-cetera))))
            :mod (m / main)))

                  :ARG1 g)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0281.8 ::date 2012-11-18T10:02:23 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Chinese government included the population problem into the overall planning of the national economy and its social development , always emphasizing that population growth and economic development need to fit together , and be coordinated with resource utilization and environmental protection .
# ::save-date Fri Jan 10, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0281_8.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (i / include-01
            :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 (c3 / country :wiki "China"
                              :name (n / name :op1 "China"))))
            :ARG1 (p / problem
                  :topic (p2 / population))
            :ARG2 (p3 / plan-01
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (e / economy
                              :mod (n2 / nation))
                        :op1 (d / develop-02
                              :ARG1 e
                              :mod (s / social)))
                  :mod (o / overall)))
      :op2 (e2 / emphasize-01
            :ARG0 g
            :ARG1 (n3 / need-01
                  :ARG1 (a7 / and
                        :op1 (f / fit-01
                              :ARG1 (a5 / and
                                    :op1 (g2 / grow-01
                                          :ARG1 p2)
                                    :op2 (d2 / develop-02
                                          :ARG1 e))
                              :manner (t2 / together))
                        :op2 (c4 / coordinate-01
                              :ARG1 a5
                              :ARG2 (a6 / and
                                    :op1 (u / utilize-01
                                          :ARG1 (r / resource))
                                    :op2 (p4 / protect-01
                                          :ARG1 (e3 / environment))))))
            :time (a3 / always)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0281.9 ::date 2012-11-18T10:35:34 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt In light of China 's basic national condition , the Chinese government has determined planned parenthood and environmental protection as two basic national policies , implementing a population policy and planned parenthood program that suits China 's actual needs .
# ::save-date Tue Apr 15, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0281_9.txt
(d / determine-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c3 / country :wiki "China" :name (n / name :op1 "China"))))
      :ARG1 (a4 / and
            :op1 (p2 / parenthood
                  :ARG1-of (p3 / plan-01))
            :op2 (p4 / protect-01
                  :ARG1 (e / environment)))
      :ARG3 (p / policy :quant 2
            :mod n2
            :mod b)
      :manner (i / implement-01
            :ARG0 g
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (p5 / policy
                        :topic (p6 / population))
                  :op2 (p7 / program
                        :topic p2)
                  :ARG1-of (s / suit-01
                        :ARG2 (t / thing
                              :ARG1-of (n4 / need-01
                                    :ARG0 c3
                                    :mod (a3 / actual))))))
      :ARG1-of (c4 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (c / condition
                  :poss c3
                  :mod (b / basic)
                  :mod (n2 / nation))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0281.10 ::date 2012-11-19T14:12:05 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt At the same time , the Chinese government also formulated a series of important policies and measures to realize continuous development , such as the protection of women 's legal rights and benefits , the promotion of equality among men and women , the forceful development of healthcare for women and children , the zealous elimination of poverty , and protecting the environment .
# ::save-date Fri Dec 13, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0281_10.txt
(f / formulate-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c3 / country :wiki "China"
                        :name (n / name :op1 "China"))))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (p / policy)
            :op2 (m / measure)
            :quant (s2 / series)
            :mod (i / important)
            :purpose (r / realize-02
                  :ARG0 g
                  :ARG1 (d / develop-02
                        :ARG1-of (c4 / continue-01)))
            :example (a2 / and
                  :op1 (p2 / protect-01
                        :ARG1 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (r2 / right)
                              :op2 (b / benefit)
                              :poss (w / woman)
                              :mod (l / law)))
                  :op2 (p3 / promote-02
                        :ARG1 (e / equal-01
                              :ARG1 (m2 / man)
                              :ARG2 w))
                  :op3 (d2 / develop-02
                        :ARG1 (h / healthcare)
                        :ARG3 (a4 / and
                              :op1 w
                              :op2 (c5 / child))
                        :manner (f2 / force-01))
                  :op4 (e2 / eliminate-01
                        :ARG1 (p4 / poverty)
                        :manner (z / zeal))
                  :op5 (p5 / protect-01
                        :ARG1 (e3 / environment))))
      :mod (a5 / also)
      :time (t2 / time
            :ARG1-of (s / same-41)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0281.11 ::date 2012-11-19T14:40:22 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Presently , the Chinese economy is continuously growing , society is stable and united , people 's livelihood are continuously improving , and the population birth rate and the natural population growth rate has dropped to a lower level .
# ::save-date Wed Dec 18, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0281_11.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (g / grow-01
            :ARG1 (e / economy
                  :poss (c4 / country :wiki "China"
                        :name (n / name :op1 "China")))
            :ARG1-of (c3 / continue-01))
      :op2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (s3 / stable
                  :domain (s2 / society))
            :op2 (u2 / unite-01
                  :ARG1 s2))
      :op3 (i / improve-01
            :ARG1 (l / livelihood
                  :poss (p2 / person))
            :ARG1-of c3)
      :op4 (d / drop-01
            :ARG1 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (r / rate
                        :mod (b / birth-01
                              :ARG1 (p3 / population)))
                  :op2 (r2 / rate
                        :mod (g2 / grow-01
                              :ARG1 p3)
                        :mod (n2 / natural)))
            :ARG4 (l2 / level
                  :mod (l3 / low
                        :degree (m / more))))
      :time (p / present))

# ::id nw.chtb_0281.12 ::date 2012-11-19T14:59:33 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :topic (p / population))
            :ARG2 (p6 / problem

                        :ARG0 (c2 / community
                              :mod (i2 / international))
                        :time (c / current)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0281.13 ::date 2012-11-19T15:12:06 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Due to differences in country 's situations , differences in economic development levels , cultural backgrounds , historical traditions , and social systems , each country should formulate suitable , effective population policies according to the actual situation of the native country .
# ::save-date Wed Dec 18, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0281_13.txt
(r / recommend-01
      :ARG1 (f / formulate-01
            :ARG0 (c / country
                  :mod (e / each))
            :ARG1 (p / policy
                  :topic (p3 / population)
                  :ARG1-of (s / suit-01)
                  :ARG1-of (c6 / conform-01
                        :ARG2 (s3 / situation
                              :mod (a / actual)
                              :poss (c2 / country
                                    :mod (n / native))))
                  :mod (e2 / effective)))
      :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (d / differ-02
                        :ARG1 (s4 / situation
                              :poss (c4 / country)))
                  :op2 (d2 / differ-02
                        :ARG1 (l / level
                              :mod (d3 / develop-02
                                    :ARG1 (e3 / economy))))
                  :op3 (d4 / differ-02
                        :ARG1 (b / background
                              :mod (c5 / culture)))
                  :op4 (d5 / differ-02
                        :ARG1 (t2 / tradition
                              :mod (h / history)))
                  :op5 (d6 / differ-02
                        :ARG1 (s5 / system
                              :mod (s6 / society))))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0281.14 ::date 2012-11-19T15:42:03 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

            :poss (c / country
                  :mod (e / each))
            :domain (t2 / this))
      :op2 (r4 / recommend-01
            :ARG1 (r2 / receive-01
                  :ARG0 t2

                        :ARG1 t2
                        :degree (f / full)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0281.15 ::date 2012-11-19T15:54:31 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt He said China was in a critical period of building up a socialist market economy system and increasing the pace of its modernization build - up , but a huge , overwhelming growth in population was still restraining the social and economic development , affecting the further improvement of the living standard of the people , and has also brought about heavy pressure on the natural resources and the natural environment .
# ::save-date Fri Jan 3, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0281_15.txt

                        :op1 (b / build-05
                              :ARG0 c3

                                    :mod (e / economy
                                          :mod (m / market)
                                          :mod (s3 / socialist))))
                        :op2 (i / increase-01
                              :ARG0 c3
                              :ARG1 (p2 / pace-01
                                    :ARG1 (b2 / build-05
                                          :ARG1 (m2 / modernize-01
                                                :ARG1 c3))))))
            :concession-of (a6 / and
                  :op1 (r / restrain-01
                        :ARG0 (g / grow-01
                              :ARG1 (p3 / population)
                              :ARG0-of (o / overwhelm-01)
                              :mod (h3 / huge))
                        :ARG1 (d / develop-02
                              :ARG1 (a3 / and
                                    :op1 (s4 / society)
                                    :op2 (e2 / economy)))
                        :mod (s6 / still))
                  :op2 (a4 / affect-01
                        :ARG0 g
                        :ARG1 (i2 / improve-01
                              :ARG1 (s5 / standard
                                    :mod (l / life
                                          :poss (p4 / person)))
                              :degree (f / further)))
                  :op3 (b3 / bring-05
                        :ARG0 g
                        :ARG1 (p5 / pressure-01
                              :ARG1 (a5 / and
                                    :op1 (r2 / resource)
                                    :op2 (e3 / environment)
                                    :mod (n2 / natural))
                              :mod (h2 / heavy))
                        :mod (a2 / also)))))

                        :manner (g / good)))

                  :mod (l / long
                        :degree (f2 / fair)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0281.17 ::date 2012-11-19T18:23:53 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :ARG1 (r / resolve-01
                        :ARG1 (p / problem
                              :topic (p2 / population)
                              :poss c3))
                  :ARG2 (a / and
                        :op1 (p3 / prosper-01
                              :ARG0 (r3 / race
                                    :mod c3))
                        :op2 (h / happy
                              :domain (g3 / generation
                                    :time (f / future)))))
            :op2 (c / contribute-01
                  :ARG0 r
                  :ARG2 (s / stabilize-01
                        :ARG0 r
                        :ARG1 (p4 / population
                              :poss (w / world)))
                  :mod (i / important)
                  :mod (a2 / also)))
      :manner (s2 / strong))

# ::id nw.chtb_0281.18 ::date 2012-11-19T18:28:48 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt For this , the Chinese government views with extreme importance and actively participates in international population activities , and sincerely hopes that the international community will adopt a stand of realistic resolution of population and development problems , seeking similarities while accommodating differences , co-operating closely to strive hard together towards a stable world population to create a beautiful future !

                                    :name (n / name :op1 "China"))))

                        :mod (i2 / international)
                        :topic (p / population))
                  :ARG2 (i / important
                        :degree (e / extreme)))
            :op2 (p2 / participate-01
                  :ARG0 g
                  :ARG1 a3
                  :manner (a4 / active)))
      :op2 (h / hope-01
            :ARG0 g
            :ARG1 (a8 / and
                  :op1 (a5 / adopt-01
                        :ARG0 (c4 / community
                              :mod (i3 / international))
                        :ARG1 (s2 / stand
                              :mod (r / resolve-01
                                    :ARG1 (p3 / problem
                                          :topic (a6 / and
                                                :op1 p
                                                :op2 (d / develop-02)))
                                    :manner (r2 / realistic))))
                  :op2 (s3 / seek-01
                        :ARG0 c4
                        :ARG1 (t / thing
                              :ARG1-of (r3 / resemble-01))
                        :time (a7 / accommodate-01
                              :ARG0 c4
                              :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                                    :ARG1-of (d2 / differ-02))))
                  :op3 (c5 / cooperate-01
                        :ARG0 c4
                        :ARG2 (s5 / strive-01
                              :ARG0 c4
                              :ARG1 (p4 / population
                                    :poss (w / world)
                                    :mod (s4 / stable))
                              :manner (h2 / hard)
                              :mod (t3 / together))
                        :manner (c / close))
                  :purpose (c6 / create-01
                        :ARG0 c4
                        :ARG1 (f / future
                              :mod (b / beautiful))))
            :manner (s / sincere))
      :purpose (t5 / this))

                                    :name (n4 / name :op1 "Macao"))))

                        :domain p6)

                        :ARG1 p6))

                  :ARG0 g2

                        :op1 (s / stability
                              :poss c)
                        :op2 (d / develop-02
                              :ARG1 c))

      :time (m3 / meet-03
            :ARG0 p5
            :ARG1 (p2 / person :wiki "Vasco_Joaquim_Rocha_Vieira"
                  :name (n7 / name :op1 "Viera")

# ::id nw.chtb_0284.5 ::date 2012-11-13T19:26:02 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                              :mod (m4 / major)

                                                                  :name (n / name :op1 "Macao")))))))))
                  :mod (v / various)))

            :mod (r2 / recent))

            :ARG0 (e / effort
                  :mod (j / joint)
                  :poss s)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0285.6 ::date 2012-11-14T23:23:54 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (h / he)

                        :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations"))

                        :name (n2 / name :op1 "European" :op2 "Union"))

                        :name (n3 / name :op1 "US"))
                  :op4 (c4 / country :wiki "Russia"
                        :name (n4 / name :op1 "Russia")))
            :purpose (f / force-01
                  :ARG0 a

                        :mod (b2 / both)

                              :name (n6 / name :op1 "Bosnia-Herzegovina")))

            :mod (j / joint)
            :mod (n5 / new)))

                        :unit (d / dollar
                              :mod c8))
                  :time (y / year
                        :mod (l3 / last)))
            :op3 (e2 / enterprise :quant 30
                  :mod (c9 / chemical)
                  :time (a3 / already)
                  :ARG0-of (e3 / export-01
                        :ARG1 (e4 / exchange
                              :mod (f / foreign)
                              :ARG0-of (s2 / surpass-01
                                    :ARG1 (m7 / monetary-quantity :quant 10000000
                                          :unit (d2 / dollar
                                                :mod c8))))))))

      :ARG1 (a / and

                        :unit m3
                        :quant-of (b2 / band
                              :mod (w2 / wave))))

                  :mod (t3 / terminal
                        :mod (t4 / telescope

                  :ARG1-of (a3 / advance-01)))
      :mod (a4 / also))

# ::id nw.chtb_0287.10 ::date 2012-11-17T21:28:16 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :mod (e2 / economy))))

            :ARG0 c

                              :poss (t / trade-01
                                    :ARG0 c))
                        :ARG1-of c5)))
      :time (f2 / from
            :op1 (n / now)))

      :mod (a2 / also))

# ::id nw.chtb_0294.15 ::date 2012-11-27T22:27:45 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Chinese government encourages and supports China 's enterprise circles in participating in Kirghizia 's economic construction on the basis of equality and mutual benefit . "
# ::save-date Mon Jan 13, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0294_15.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (e / encourage-01
            :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 (c3 / country :wiki "China"
                              :name (n / name :op1 "China"))))
            :ARG1 (c4 / circle
                  :mod (e2 / enterprise)
                  :poss c3)
            :ARG2 (p / participate-01
                  :ARG0 g
                  :ARG1 (c5 / construct-01
                        :ARG0 (c6 / country :wiki "Kyrgyzstan"
                              :name (n2 / name :op1 "Kirghizia"))
                        :ARG1 (e3 / economy))))
      :op2 (s / support-01
            :ARG0 g
            :ARG1 p)
      :ARG1-of (b3 / base-02
            :ARG2 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (e4 / equal-01)
                  :op2 (b2 / benefit
                        :mod (m / mutual)))))

                  :name (n3 / name :op1 "China"))

                  :poss p3)))

                  :ARG1 (c4 / country :wiki "Iran"
                        :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))

                        :mod (v / vice))
                  :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1)))

            :ARG0 p

                  :ARG0 (t2 / thing
                        :ARG2-of (r / result-01
                              :ARG1 (v2 / visit-01
                                    :ARG0 p
                                    :ARG1 (c5 / country :wiki "China"
                                          :name (n3 / name :op1 "China")))))
                  :ARG1 p

                        :op1 (e2 / end-01
                              :ARG0 p
                              :ARG1 (v3 / visit-01
                                    :ARG0 p
                                    :ARG1 c5
                                    :duration (t / temporal-quantity :quant 3
                                          :unit (d2 / day))
                                    :ARG1-of (f2 / friendly-41))))))
      :time (t4 / today
            :time-of (a2 / arrive-01
                  :ARG1 p
                  :ARG4 (c6 / city :wiki "Tehran"
                        :name (n4 / name :op1 "Tehran"))
                  :direction (b / back))))

                        :ARG0 a2

                              :ARG2 e)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0295.5 ::date 2012-11-27T23:16:50 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Thu Dec 11, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0295_5.txt

                  :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity :value 3)))

            :ARG0 a
            :ARG1 (e / equipment
                  :instrument-of (r2 / refine-01
                        :ARG1 (o / oil))
                  :poss c4)
            :purpose (e2 / expand-01
                  :ARG0 r
                  :ARG1 (c7 / capable-41
                        :ARG2 (e3 / extract-01
                              :ARG1 (p / petroleum
                                    :poss c5)))))
      :mod (a2 / also)
      :manner (j / joint))

# ::id nw.chtb_0298.2 ::date 2012-11-27T23:25:00 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Russia 's last group of personnel that should withdraw of the Northwest military troop stationed in the three countries of the Baltic Sea completely withdrew from Latvia on the 31st .
# ::save-date Fri Jan 3, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0298_2.txt
(w / withdraw-01
      :ARG0 (g / group
            :poss (c3 / country :wiki "Russia"
                  :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russia"))
            :mod (l3 / last)
            :consist-of (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (t / troop
                              :mod (m / military)
                              :ARG1-of (s / station-01
                                    :ARG2 (c4 / country :quant 3
                                          :location (s2 / sea :wiki "Baltic_Sea"
                                                :name (n4 / name :op1 "Baltic" :op2 "Sea"))))
                              :mod (n / northwest))
                        :ARG2 (p2 / personnel)))
            :ARG0-of (w2 / withdraw-01
                  :ARG1-of (r2 / recommend-01)))
      :ARG2 (c6 / country :wiki "Latvia"
            :name (n5 / name :op1 "Latvia"))
      :degree (c5 / complete)
      :time (d2 / date-entity :day 31))

# ::id nw.chtb_0298.3 ::date 2012-11-27T23:31:21 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Sun Dec 22, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0298_3.txt

      :ARG0 (c3 / country :wiki "Russia"
            :name (n / name :op1 "Russia"))
      :ARG1 (w / work-01
            :ARG1 (w2 / withdraw-01
                  :ARG1 (t / troop)
                  :ARG2 (c4 / country :quant 3
                        :location (s / sea :wiki "Baltic_Sea"
                              :name (n2 / name :op1 "Baltic" :op2 "Sea")))))
      :time (u / until
            :op1 (n3 / now)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0298.4 ::date 2012-11-27T23:32:55 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt It is reported by news media here that on the 31st , the personnel of the Russian Northwest troop headquarters turned over military installations to the local government , submitted a report to Latvian president Ulmanis regarding the completion of troop withdrawal , and then withdrew from Riga to Moscow by plane .
# ::save-date Tue Apr 15, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0298_4.txt
(r3 / report-01
      :ARG0 (m2 / media
            :mod (n2 / news)
            :location (h / here))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (t / turn-12
                  :ARG0 (p5 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h4 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (h2 / headquarters
                                    :part-of (t2 / troop
                                          :mod (c4 / country :wiki "Russia"
                                                :name (n3 / name :op1 "Russia"))
                                          :mod (n / northwest)))
                              :ARG2 (p2 / personnel)))
                  :ARG1 (t4 / thing
                        :ARG1-of (i / install-01
                              :ARG0 (m3 / military)))
                  :ARG2 (g2 / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01
                              :mod (l2 / local))))
            :op2 (s / submit-01
                  :ARG0 p5
                  :ARG1 (r4 / report-01
                        :ARG0 p5
                        :ARG1 (c6 / complete-01
                              :ARG1 (w / withdraw-01
                                    :ARG1 (t3 / troop))))
                  :ARG2 (p / person :wiki "Guntis_Ulmanis"
                        :name (n4 / name :op1 "Ulmanis")
                        :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (c5 / country :wiki "Latvia"
                                    :name (n5 / name :op1 "Latvia"))
                              :ARG2 (p3 / president))))
            :op3 (w2 / withdraw-01
                  :ARG0 p5
                  :ARG1 p5
                  :ARG2 (c7 / city :wiki "Riga"
                        :name (n6 / name :op1 "Riga"))
                  :direction (c8 / city :wiki "Moscow"
                        :name (n7 / name :op1 "Moscow"))
                  :manner (p4 / plane)
                  :time (t5 / then))
            :time (d / date-entity :day 31)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0298.5 ::date 2012-11-27T23:40:28 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Russian troops stationed in Lithuania already withdrew back home before August 31st of 1993 , and troops stationed in Estonia completed troop withdrawal work on the 29th of this month .
# ::save-date Mon Dec 16, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0298_5.txt

      :op1 (w / withdraw-01
            :ARG0 (t / troop
                  :mod (c4 / country :wiki "Russia"
                        :name (n / name :op1 "Russia"))

                        :ARG2 (c5 / country :wiki "Lithuania"
                              :name (n2 / name :op1 "Lithuania"))))
            :time (a2 / already)
            :time (b2 / before
                  :op1 (d / date-entity :month 8 :day 31 :year 1993))
            :destination (h / home)
            :direction (b / back))
      :op2 (c6 / complete-01
            :ARG0 (t2 / troop
                  :ARG1-of (s2 / station-01
                        :ARG2 (c7 / country :wiki "Estonia"
                              :name (n3 / name :op1 "Estonia"))))
            :ARG1 (w2 / work-01
                  :ARG0 t2
                  :ARG1 (w3 / withdraw-01
                        :ARG1 (t3 / troop)))
            :time (d2 / date-entity :day 29
                  :part-of (m / month
                        :mod (t4 / this)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0298.6 ::date 2012-11-27T23:44:18 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt According to agreements reached by Russia with the governments of Latvia and Estonia , currently there are still a few hundred Russian military experts remaining in the early warning radar stations of the Latvian and Russian naval education centers in Estonia .
# ::save-date Fri Jan 3, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0298_6.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (t / thing
            :ARG1-of (a / agree-01
                  :ARG0 (c4 / country :wiki "Russia"
                        :name (n / name :op1 "Russia"))
                  :ARG2 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (g / government-organization
                              :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                                    :ARG1 (c5 / country :wiki "Latvia"
                                          :name (n2 / name :op1 "Latvia"))))
                        :op2 (g3 / government-organization
                              :ARG0-of (g4 / govern-01
                                    :ARG1 (c6 / country :wiki "Estonia"
                                          :name (n3 / name :op1 "Estonia")))))
                  :ARG1-of (r2 / reach-01
                        :ARG0 (a4 / and
                              :op1 c4
                              :op2 a2))))
      :ARG1 (r3 / remain-01
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :ARG1-of (e2 / expert-41
                        :ARG2 (m / military
                              :mod c4))
                  :quant (f / few :op1 100))
            :mod (s2 / still)
            :time (c7 / current)
            :location (a3 / and
                  :op1 (s3 / station
                        :mod (r4 / radar
                              :ARG0-of (w / warn-01
                                    :time (e3 / early)))
                        :poss (c8 / center
                              :mod (e4 / educate-01
                                    :ARG2 (n4 / navy))
                              :poss c5
                              :location c6))
                  :op2 (s4 / station
                        :mod r4
                        :poss (c9 / center
                              :mod e4
                              :poss c4
                              :location c6)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0298.7 ::date 2012-11-27T23:54:55 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :mod (c4 / country :wiki "Soviet_Union"
            :name (n4 / name :op1 "Soviet" :op2 "Union"))

      :ARG1-of (s2 / station-01
            :ARG2 (c5 / country :quant 3
                  :location (a / above)))
      :ARG1-of (h / headquarter-01
            :location (c6 / country :wiki "Latvia"
                  :name (n5 / name :op1 "Latvian" :op2 "Republic")))
      :domain (c / cluster
            :consist-of (t / troop
                  :mod (c3 / country :wiki "Russia"
                        :name (n3 / name :op1 "Russia"))
                  :mod (n / northwest))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0298.8 ::date 2012-11-27T23:59:06 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The total original military strength was more than 116,000 people , within which most , more than 50,000 people , were stationed in Latvia ; more than 35,000 people in Lithuania , and more than 30,000 people in Estonia .
# ::save-date Fri Jan 3, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0298_8.txt
(t / total-01
      :ARG1 (s / strength
            :poss (m / military)
            :mod (o / original))
      :ARG2 (p / person
            :quant (m2 / more-than :op1 116000)
            :ARG2-of (i / include-91
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (p5 / person
                              :quant (m6 / most
                                    :ARG0-of (m7 / mean-01
                                          :ARG1 (m3 / more-than :op1 50000)))
                              :ARG1-of (s2 / station-01
                                    :ARG2 (c4 / country :wiki "Latvia"
                                          :name (n / name :op1 "Latvia"))))
                        :op2 (p3 / person
                              :quant (m4 / more-than :op1 35000)
                              :ARG1-of (s3 / station-01
                                    :ARG2 (c5 / country :wiki "Lithuania"
                                          :name (n2 / name :op1 "Lithuania"))))
                        :op3 (p4 / person
                              :quant (m5 / more-than :op1 30000)
                              :ARG1-of (s4 / station-01
                                    :ARG2 (c6 / country :wiki "Estonia"
                                          :name (n3 / name :op1 "Estonia"))))))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0298.9 ::date 2012-11-28T20:43:43 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :name (n2 / name :op1 "Soviet" :op2 "Union")
                        :time (f / former)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0298.10 ::date 2012-11-28T20:45:44 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (s2 / station-01

                  :mod (c3 / country :wiki "Russia"

                              :location (s3 / sea :wiki "Baltic_Sea"
                                    :name (n2 / name :op1 "Baltic" :op2 "Sea")))))
            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (s4 / state :wiki -
                        :name (n3 / name :op1 "Jalininggele")
                        :location c3)
                  :op2 (s5 / state :wiki -
                        :name (n4 / name :op1 "Simolingsike"))
                  :op3 (c5 / city :wiki -
                        :name (n5 / name :op1 "Yelinia")
                        :location (r / relative-position
                              :op1 (c6 / city :wiki "Moscow"
                                    :name (n6 / name :op1 "Moscow"))
                              :quant (d / distance-quantity :quant 300
                                    :unit (k / kilometer)))))
            :mod (r3 / respective)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0302.2 ::date 2012-11-28T20:52:04 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt When meeting with Chavalit Yoncayu , vice-premier and concurrent Minister of Domestic Affairs of Thailand , at the Diaoyutai State Guesthouse today , Huaqing Liu , vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission said that China placed a great deal of importance in developing friendship with the government , people and Armed Forces of Thailand , especially the economic and trade cooperation between the two countries .
# ::save-date Sun Dec 22, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0302_2.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (p3 / person :wiki "Liu_Huaqing"
            :name (n / name :op1 "Huaqing" :op2 "Liu")

                        :mod (v / vice))))

            :ARG0 (c7 / country :wiki "China"
                  :name (n3 / name :op1 "China"))

                  :quant (d3 / deal
                        :mod (g2 / great)))
            :ARG2 (d4 / develop-02
                  :ARG0 c7
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (f2 / friendship
                              :prep-with (a2 / and
                                    :op1 (g3 / government-organization
                                          :ARG0-of (g4 / govern-01

                        :op2 (c9 / cooperate-01
                              :ARG0 c7
                              :ARG1 c8
                              :ARG2 (a3 / and
                                    :op1 (e / economy)
                                    :op2 (t2 / trade-01))
                              :mod (e2 / especially)))))
      :time (m2 / meet-03
            :ARG0 p3
            :ARG1 (p6 / person :wiki "Chavalit_Yongchaiyudh"
                  :name (n6 / name :op1 "Chavalit" :op2 "Yoncayu")
                  :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG2 (p7 / premier
                              :mod (v2 / vice)))
                  :ARG0-of (h4 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (g5 / government-organization :wiki "Ministry_of_Interior_(Thailand)"
                              :name (n7 / name :op1 "Domestic" :op2 "Affairs")
                              :poss c8)
                        :ARG2 (m3 / minister
                              :mod (c2 / concurrent))))
            :location (h2 / hotel :wiki "Diaoyutai_State_Guesthouse"

            :time (t4 / today)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0303.2 ::date 2012-11-28T21:53:30 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Guofang Shen , The foreign ministry spokesperson , announced at a news conference held this afternoon that President Gentzs Aerpade of the Hungary Republic , would pay a State visit to China from September 14th to the 17th at the invitation of president Zemin Jiang .
# ::save-date Fri Jan 3, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0303_2.txt
(a / announce-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :wiki -
            :name (n / name :op1 "Guofang" :op2 "Shen")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (g4 / government-organization :wiki "Ministry_of_Foreign_Affairs_of_the_People's_Republic_of_China"
                        :name (n2 / name :op1 "Foreign" :op2 "Ministry"))
                  :ARG2 (s / spokesperson)))
      :ARG1 (v / visit-01
            :ARG0 (p2 / person :wiki "rpd_Gncz"
                  :name (n3 / name :op1 "Gentzs" :op2 "Aerpade")
                  :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c3 / country :wiki "Hungary"
                              :name (n4 / name :op1 "Hungary" :op2 "Republic"))
                        :ARG2 (p3 / president)))
            :ARG1 (c4 / country :wiki "China"
                  :name (n5 / name :op1 "China"))
            :mod (s2 / state)
            :duration (d / date-interval
                  :op1 (d2 / date-entity :month 9 :day 14)
                  :op2 (d3 / date-entity :month 9 :day 17))
            :ARG2-of (i / invite-01
                  :ARG0 (p4 / person :wiki "Jiang_Zemin"
                        :name (n6 / name :op1 "Zemin" :op2 "Jiang")
                        :ARG0-of (h4 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG2 (p5 / president)))))
      :time (c6 / conference
            :mod (n7 / news)
            :ARG1-of (h2 / hold-04
                  :time (a2 / afternoon
                        :mod (t / this)))))

            :name (n3 / name :op1 "China"))

                              :name (n5 / name :op1 "State" :op2 "Council"))

# ::id nw.chtb_0305.4 ::date 2012-12-11T22:23:38 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The six documents are : an agreement on Chinese providing a loan to the Kirghizia government , an agreement on forming a combined Economy and Trade Committee between the Sino - Kirghizian governments , an note exchange on the presenting of materials to Kirghizia by China , a cultural cooperation agreement between the two countries of China and Kirghizia , ratification letters on exchanging consular treaties between the two countries , an agreement on cooperating on the China Trade Promotion Council and the Kirghizian Chamber of Industry and Commerce .
# ::save-date Fri Jan 3, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0305_4.txt
(i / include-91
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (a2 / agree-01
                  :ARG1 (l / loan-01
                        :ARG0 (p2 / person
                              :mod c7)
                        :ARG2 (g2 / government-organization
                              :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01
                                    :ARG1 (c5 / country :wiki "Kyrgyzstan"
                                          :name (n4 / name :op1 "Kirghizia"))))))
            :op2 (a3 / agree-01
                  :ARG1 (f / form-01
                        :ARG0 (a4 / and
                              :op1 (g5 / government-organization
                                    :ARG0-of (g6 / govern-01
                                          :ARG1 (c7 / country :wiki "China"
                                                :name (n6 / name :op1 "China"))))
                              :op2 (g7 / government-organization
                                    :ARG0-of (g8 / govern-01
                                          :ARG1 c5)))
                        :ARG1 (g4 / government-organization :wiki -
                              :name (n5 / name :op1 "Economy" :op2 "and" :op3 "Trade" :op4 "Committee")
                              :ARG3-of (c6 / combine-01))))
            :op3 (e2 / exchange-01
                  :mod (n7 / note)
                  :topic (p3 / present-01
                        :ARG0 c7
                        :ARG1 (m / material)
                        :ARG2 c5))
            :op4 (a5 / agree-01
                  :ARG0 (a6 / and
                        :op1 c7
                        :op2 c5)
                  :ARG1 (c8 / cooperate-01
                        :ARG0 c7
                        :ARG1 (c9 / culture)
                        :ARG2 c5))
            :op5 (l2 / letter
                  :ARG0-of (r / ratify-01)
                  :topic (e3 / exchange-01
                        :ARG0 c7
                        :ARG1 (t / treaty
                              :mod (c10 / consul))
                        :ARG2 c5))
            :op6 (a7 / agree-01
                  :ARG1 (c11 / cooperate-01
                        :ARG2 (a8 / and
                              :op1 (g9 / government-organization :wiki "China_Council_for_the_Promotion_of_International_Trade"
                                    :name (n8 / name :op1 "Trade" :op2 "Promotion" :op3 "Council")
                                    :poss c7)
                              :op2 (g10 / government-organization :wiki -
                                    :name (n9 / name :op1 "Chamber" :op2 "of" :op3 "Industry" :op4 "and" :op5 "Commerce")
                                    :poss c5)))))
      :ARG2 (d / document :quant 6))

# ::id nw.chtb_0305.10 ::date 2012-12-11T23:04:12 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt He expressed hopes that the Central Asian region would be stable and developed , and that the standard of living of the people would continuously improve .
# ::save-date Tue Jan 21, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0305_10.txt
(e / express-01
      :ARG0 (h / he)
      :ARG1 (h2 / hope-01
            :ARG0 h
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (s / stable
                              :domain (w / world-region :wiki "Central_Asia"
                                    :name (n / name :op1 "Central" :op2 "Asia")))
                        :op2 (d / develop-02
                              :ARG1 w))
                  :op2 (i / improve-01
                        :ARG0 (s2 / standard
                              :mod (l / live-01)

                                    :poss (f / friendly-41
                                          :mod (i / international))))))))

            :part-of (t / team
                  :mod (c6 / country :wiki "Korea"
                        :name (n4 / name :op1 "Korea"))))
      :ARG1 (a2 / and
            :op1 (p10 / person :wiki -
                  :name (n5 / name :op1 "Jing" :op2 "Lui")
                  :mod (l4 / level
                        :ord (o4 / ordinal-entity :value 5)))
            :op2 (p11 / person :wiki "Ma_Xiaochun"
                  :name (n6 / name :op1 "Xiaocun" :op2 "Ma")
                  :mod l)
            :op3 (p12 / person :wiki -
                  :name (n7 / name :op1 "Jianhong" :op2 "Wang")
                  :mod l2)
            :part-of (t2 / team
                  :mod (c7 / country :wiki "China"
                        :name (n8 / name :op1 "China"))))
      :mod (r / respective))

# ::id nw.chtb_0322.17 ::date 2012-12-29T15:48:41 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt According to the rules discussed and agreed upon by both sides , if the two teams draw with 7 : 7 , then the final result will be determined by the result of the competition between Weiping Nie of the Chinese team and Xunxuan Cao of the Korean team .
# ::save-date Fri Jan 3, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0322_17.txt
(d2 / determine-01
      :ARG0 (t4 / thing
            :ARG2-of (r3 / result-01
                  :ARG1 (c4 / compete-01
                        :ARG0 (p3 / person :wiki "Nie_Weiping"
                              :name (n / name :op1 "Weiping" :op2 "Nie")
                              :part-of (t / team
                                    :mod (c5 / country :wiki "China"
                                          :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))))
                        :ARG1 (p4 / person :wiki -
                              :name (n3 / name :op1 "XunXuan" :op2 "Cao")
                              :part-of (t2 / team
                                    :mod (c6 / country :wiki "Korea"
                                          :name (n4 / name :op1 "Korea")))))))
      :ARG1 (r2 / result-01
            :mod (f / final))
      :condition (d3 / draw-00
            :ARG0 t
            :ARG1 t2
            :quant (s / score-entity :op1 7 :op2 7))
      :ARG1-of (c / conform-01
            :ARG2 (r / rule
                  :ARG1-of (d / discuss-01
                        :ARG0 (s2 / side
                              :mod (b / both)))
                  :ARG1-of (a / agree-01
                        :ARG0 s2))))

                  :poss (c / compete-01))
            :time (t / time
                  :mod (t2 / this)))

            :op1 (g / get-01
                  :ARG0 (t3 / team
                        :ARG0-of (w / win-01))
                  :ARG1 (m6 / monetary-quantity :quant 70000
                        :unit (d / dollar
                              :mod c4)))

                        :ARG0-of (l / lose-03))

                        :unit (d2 / dollar
                              :mod c4)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0325.2 ::date 2012-12-29T22:05:02 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The performance of the female competitors of the Chinese diving team , Mingxia Fu and Bin Chi , in the first 6 rounds of the 10 - meter platform diving preliminary competition at the Seventh World Swimming Championships held here today was ideal , and hopes of entering the heats are in sight .
# ::save-date Fri Jan 3, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0325_2.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (i / ideal
            :domain (p3 / perform-01
                  :ARG0 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (p4 / person :wiki "Fu_Mingxia"
                              :name (n / name :op1 "Mingxia" :op2 "Fu"))
                        :op2 (p5 / person :wiki -
                              :name (n2 / name :op1 "Bin" :op2 "Chi"))
                        :ARG0-of (c3 / compete-01)
                        :mod (f / female)
                        :part-of (t / team
                              :mod (c4 / country :wiki "China"
                                    :name (n3 / name :op1 "China"))
                              :ARG0-of (d2 / dive-01)))
                  :time (r / round :quant 6
                        :part-of (c / compete-01
                              :mod (p6 / preliminary)
                              :mod (d3 / dive-01
                                    :mod (p7 / platform
                                          :mod (d4 / distance-quantity :quant 10
                                                :unit (m3 / meter))))
                              :subevent-of (g / game :wiki -
                                    :name (n4 / name :op1 "Seventh" :op2 "World" :op3 "Swimming" :op4 "Championships"))
                              :ARG1-of (h / hold-04
                                    :location (h2 / here)
                                    :time (t2 / today)))
                        :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1))))
      :op2 (i2 / in-sight
            :domain (h3 / hope-01
                  :ARG1 (e2 / enter-01
                        :ARG0 a2
                        :ARG1 (h4 / heat)))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0325.3 ::date 2012-12-29T22:20:01 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt At the time this reporter dispatched , in the first 6 rounds of competition , Mingxia Fu and Bin Chi are temporarily occupying the first and third positions with total scores of 339.12 and 290.19 points respectively .
# ::save-date Sun Jan 12, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0325_3.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (o / occupy-01
            :ARG0 (p3 / person :wiki "Fu_Mingxia"
                  :name (n / name :op1 "Mingxia" :op2 "Fu"))
            :ARG1 (p4 / position
                  :ord (o3 / ordinal-entity :value 1))
            :ARG2 (s / score-01
                  :ARG0 p3
                  :ARG1 (p5 / point
                        :quant (x / 339.12
                              :ARG2-of (t / total-01
                                    :ARG1 p5)))))
      :op2 (o2 / occupy-01
            :ARG0 (p6 / person :wiki -
                  :name (n2 / name :op1 "Bin" :op2 "Chi"))
            :ARG1 (p7 / position
                  :ord (o4 / ordinal-entity :value 3))
            :ARG2 (s2 / score-01
                  :ARG0 p6
                  :ARG1 (p8 / point :quant 290.19)
                  :mod t))
      :mod (r / respective)
      :duration (t3 / temporary)
      :time (d / dispatch-01
            :ARG0 (p9 / person
                  :ARG0-of (r2 / report-01)
                  :mod (t2 / this)))
      :time (r3 / round :quant 6
            :part-of (c / compete-01)
            :ord (o5 / ordinal-entity :value 1)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0325.4 ::date 2012-12-29T22:23:53 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt If accidents do not occur , their hopes of entering the heats are already in sight .
# ::save-date Mon Jan 27, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0325_4.txt
(i / in-sight
      :domain (h / hope-01
            :ARG0 (t / they)
            :ARG1 (e / enter-01
                  :ARG0 t
                  :ARG1 (h2 / heat)))
      :time (a / already)
      :condition (a2 / accident :polarity -))

# ::id nw.chtb_0325.5 ::date 2012-12-29T22:31:52 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Occupying the second position is the US competitor , Richard .
# ::save-date Tue Dec 17, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0325_5.txt
(o / occupy-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person :wiki -
            :name (n / name :op1 "Richard")
            :mod (c2 / country :wiki "United_States"
                  :name (n2 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))
            :ARG0-of (c3 / compete-01))
      :ARG1 (p3 / position
            :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity :value 2)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0325.6 ::date 2012-12-29T22:32:54 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Her performance was 303.00 points .
# ::save-date Tue Dec 17, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0325_6.txt
(p2 / point :quant 303.00
      :domain (p / perform-01
            :ARG0 (s / she)))

# ::id nw.chtb_0325.7 ::date 2012-12-29T22:33:34 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt In the preliminary men 's 1 - meter platform diving competition this morning , our competitors Lan Wei and Sheng Chen have already gained rights to the heats .
# ::save-date Fri Jan 3, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0325_7.txt
(g / gain-02
      :ARG0 (a / and
            :op1 (p3 / person :wiki "Lan_Wei"
                  :name (n / name :op1 "Lan" :op2 "Wei"))
            :op2 (p4 / person :wiki -
                  :name (n2 / name :op1 "Sheng" :op2 "Chen"))
            :ARG0-of (c / compete-01
                  :ARG1 (w / we)))
      :ARG1 (e / entitle-01
            :ARG1 (h / heat)
            :ARG2 a)
      :time (c2 / compete-01
            :mod (p5 / preliminary)
            :mod (d2 / dive-01
                  :ARG0 (m2 / man)
                  :mod (p6 / platform
                        :mod (d3 / distance-quantity :quant 1
                              :unit (m3 / meter)))))
      :time (m4 / morning
            :mod (t / this))
      :time (a2 / already))

# ::id nw.chtb_0325.8 ::date 2012-12-29T22:42:24 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The results of today 's preliminary women 's water - polo competition are : the Hungarian team defeated the Canadian team by 13 : 7 , the French team defeated the Brazilian team by 10 : 9 , the Australian team defeated the German team by 10 : 8 , the Russian team defeated the Dutch team by 7 : 6 , the US team defeated the Kazakhstani team by 10 : 5 , and the Italian team defeated the New Zealand team by 12 : 2 .
# ::save-date Tue Dec 17, 2013 ::file nw_chtb_0325_8.txt
(r2 / result-01
      :ARG1 (c13 / compete-01
            :ARG0 (w / woman)
            :mod (p / preliminary)
            :time (t / today)
            :mod (p14 / polo
                  :mod (w2 / water)))
      :ARG2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (d / defeat-01
                  :ARG0 (t2 / team
                        :mod (c14 / country :wiki "Hungary"
                              :name (n5 / name :op1 "Hungary")))
                  :ARG1 (t3 / team
                        :mod (c15 / country :wiki "Canada"
                              :name (n6 / name :op1 "Canada")))
                  :quant (s / score-entity :op1 13 :op2 7))
            :op2 (d2 / defeat-01
                  :ARG0 (t4 / team
                        :mod (c16 / country :wiki "France"
                              :name (n7 / name :op1 "France")))
                  :ARG1 (t5 / team
                        :mod (c17 / country :wiki "Brazil"
                              :name (n8 / name :op1 "Brazil")))
                  :quant (s2 / score-entity :op1 10 :op2 9))
            :op3 (d3 / defeat-01
                  :ARG0 (t6 / team
                        :mod (c18 / country :wiki "Australia"
                              :name (n9 / name :op1 "Australia")))
                  :ARG1 (t7 / team
                        :mod (c19 / country :wiki "Germany"
                              :name (n10 / name :op1 "Germany")))
                  :quant (s3 / score-entity :op1 10 :op2 8))
            :op4 (d4 / defeat-01
                  :ARG0 (t8 / team
                        :mod (c20 / country :wiki "Russia"
                              :name (n11 / name :op1 "Russia")))
                  :ARG1 (t9 / team
                        :mod (c21 / country :wiki "Netherlands"
                              :name (n12 / name :op1 "Netherlands")))
                  :quant (s4 / score-entity :op1 7 :op2 6))
            :op5 (d5 / defeat-01
                  :ARG0 (t10 / team
                        :mod (c22 / country :wiki "United_States"
                              :name (n13 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States")))
                  :ARG1 (t11 / team
                        :mod (c23 / country :wiki "Kazakhstan"
                              :name (n14 / name :op1 "Kazakhstan")))
                  :quant (s5 / score-entity :op1 10 :op2 5))
            :op6 (d6 / defeat-01
                  :ARG0 (t12 / team
                        :mod (c24 / country :wiki "Italy"
                              :name (n15 / name :op1 "Italy")))
                  :ARG1 (t13 / team
                        :mod (c25 / country :wiki "New_Zealand"
                              :name (n16 / name :op1 "New" :op2 "Zealand")))
                  :quant (s6 / score-entity :op1 12 :op2 2))))

# ::id nw.chtb_0325.9 ::date 2012-12-29T22:52:27 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt There are 12 teams totally participating in the competition .
# ::save-date Sun Jan 12, 2014 ::file nw_chtb_0325_9.txt
(p / participate-01
      :ARG0 (t / team
            :quant (x / 12
                  :ARG2-of (t2 / total-01
                        :ARG1 t)))
      :ARG1 (c / compete-01))

# ::id nw.chtb_0325.10 ::date 2012-12-29T22:53:20 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt ( End )
# ::save-date Sat Dec 29, 2012 ::file nw_chtb_0325_10.txt
(e / end-01)
